content: You can never get a ride between 6am and 7am. The GPS always sends them to a different location then what I pin point. I'm always charge for the drivers mess up. Some drivers shouldn't be driving. They always say no cars are available. I tried ordering a Uber around 4 it kept telling me no rides available. But as soon as the price changed a ride was available. And I had to wait longer for a ride. I also had to pay $10 more than usual. I would recommend Lyft. Uber gets worse and worse by the day

I've been using this app since a long time , but recently I faced Miscalculation of the charges to be paid for the trips twice. I've been charged double the price I've been shown when booking the cab. Thought this might be due to bad weather but this happened again on a normal day. I'm not using this app again if such problem is occurs again. There's no number to contact support team. They don't even reply to customer complaints. This is totally not acceptable to have no customer service at all.

prices are past the point of ridiculous now. I was given a quote for a trip that quadrupled in price as soon as I got to the pickup location. complete scam. estimated times are extremely unreliable. DON'T USE THIS APP IF YOU ARE IN A RUSH!!! and drivers will follow gps off a cliff. when competition brings this company to it's knees, I won't shed a tear

It charged me twice for a trip. The trip was taken almost an year ago. I had then paid in cash. But, today, it showed outstanding and charged me. When I tried to resolve the issue, it showed that trips older than a month are not reviewed. Then, why did they charge me second time after a year? You have robbed me of my money. You should return it. I will complain to the consumer court, if you don't refund my money.

Application in general ok. The only problem is it will give you a fare amount for the journey and at times end up charging more. Uber will tell you this is because it because of unforseen circumstances. But fact of the matter is if charge amount is given it should be that. If a driver decides to reroute and you might find that you are charged more. I only use them if there is nothing else. Most drivers are good and will stick to the route but you do get some. Overall, look for another carrier.

The problem I have with this app is that recently I've been having drivers select to come pick me up and they're about 10-20 minutes away finishing up another ride. They finish the ride to start making their way to me and after 5 minutes they just cancel the ride. I've wasted so much time trying to find rides just to have a driver cancel on me. I feel like the drivers should be penalized for doing that. I should at least give them a review after x amount of time.

Would give less if i could. App used to be great but for the past month and half it's always "no cars available " or "fares higher due to demand" ..change rides that are usually 5 to 10 mins and about $8. To $15 rides with like 15 min wait times. What is the point? As the name implies "uber" used to be a way to get a quick ride usually for a decent prices. None if these things are possible as of late. Just as bad as lyft!

This week, I tried scheduling my rides ahead of time. When the time came, but when the time came, the app would tell me that there were no cars available and to try and schedule another ride later. Or if there was a car, it would cost me more than double as usual. What is the point of scheduling a ride if you won't get one at the specific time you wanted it. I did this for the past 5 days with the same results. Very disappointed.

Uber at its core is good, what makes it bad is the UI and the ability to switch prices midride or while waiting for a ride. No one should have to wait 20 minutes for a ride just for it to tell you prices have changed now; allows you to "confirm" new price and has another popout 20 seconds later for another change in price. This app is not worth it, I feel robbed of money and my time.

Apparently, I'm not the only one who can't get an Uber these days. These days, there are never any drivers available in my area. It used to be that I would see 5-10 drivers near me when I opened the app. Since 2021 began, I've noticed this difference, which I guess is due to app updates and new services. Both Uber and Lyft are total fails now.

Nice app, way cheaper than other cab services. but need to improve/ set one feature for the issue i have faced many times! Driver has accepted the ride and when I called him to ask where he is, he told me to cancel the ride by my end just because he was not able to search the location or may be other reason i don't know bcz he pinged me 2 mins ago before the call that he has arrived! And i know if i will be the one who is cancelling the ride i'll be the one who will be charged for no reason!

I wanted to rate it negative but option wasn't there. There is not a single complaint, there are multiple. 1)every time it takes wrong location 2)driver cancels it without any information and cancellation fees is added to my account without my recognition 3)sometimes takes charge than what was earlier shown. In short it's a cheap app. It doesn't have any standards.

Good for rides but if you want food just use just eat. The app froze and so I thought the order was cancelled. Also side sending my order to my work place for some reason. I phoned the help line who just tell you to use their app help section, which only tells you to contact the restaurant. Really the worse experience from a customer bases I have ever had. The online website is better with fewer bugs. But if you have any issues save yourself the wait and just accept what you get.

I'm absolutely finished with Uber. Not only do rides dry up by 9pm, the time I usually work, but prices jumping from a usual $20, to $75 FOR A 15 MINUTE RIDE, is absolutely atrocious. I don't want to hear that it's because there aren't a lot of drivers out, because there are plenty of nights where I spend hours searching and the price doesn't change at all, let alone so drastically. Lyft is the clearly superior app and I'm disgusted that I White-Knighted for Uber for so long. Despicable.

Sometimes rides are priced up to four times the usual rate - $90 and up. It offered 5 different rides of which were $90 and up. There should be at least some sort of price control, especially during covid. The car is less than 10 miles away and the drive to my destination is less than 10. The cost of the gas/gallon is less than $5 in my state.

Terrible service, why create an app that's supposed to be a modern day taxi/delivery service but never have cars available? Then when a car is found it takes between 25 to 20 minutes for the car to be sent to your location or they will try to charge you $30 to go 2.5 miles up the road because no cars are in your particular area. This app is worst than riding the bus but at least the bus is on time and always running.

The app stopped requesting through my account totally and from other accounts I created with my other numbers. When I reached out for the customer service, the agents never said the reason why my accounts have been permanently disabled (even the new one when it was literally 5 minutes old). No one ever helped with this issue and I have never faced such bad service anywhere else. Also the application doesn't always work well and Uber Bus sometimes is not working (when my account wasn't disabled).

I used Uber for about a year or so before I had been let down one too many times. I am currently trying to get back in during this pandemic but since I opted out after uninstalling, they tell me I have to text start to get my verification code before moving forward. I sent that text like 6-7 times and I still haven't heard anything for almost two weeks now. If they are going to just leave me hanging after doing what was instructed, then maybe I shouldn't use this again.

Rides that were $15 are now $30 or even $40, with drivers being non-exist or extremely far away. Have had multiple encounters in the past few days where drivers will take a long time to get to me, only to cancel when they see me. Something that never happened to me until recently, but they have the audacity to want us to pay double the rates for this. Come on.

This Uber app is trash! It takes too long to select a ride close by to get to my destination, it cancels my trip after it offers me a higher price when I shouldn't have to pay for. This app needs to do better to find available drivers that are willing to take passengers to wherever they need to be instead of giving them a hard time to find a driver for them. RIDICULOUS!!!!

This app started out being reliable I've been using it to get to and from work and it's worked just fine but recently over the past 2 months I will have requested a ride only for the wait to get connected to a driver be over 15 minutes then that driver will be 30 minutes away, then when they are about 5 or 10 minutes from picking me up they cancel and I have had to request another ride. Also recently the prices have gone up from $10 or $15 to now $30 or $70 per ride I can't rely on it anymore

There's basically never any drivers when i actually need them. the single time i managed to find a ride it took almost two hours of attempts and i was over an hour late to work another time because between you and the local taxis there's not a single ounce of dependability. Also: do better for the workers you do have, they're the only reason you are still here. you ran away from California when they told you to do better instead of stepping up, cowards.

If you are doing online payment through credit card, payment is charged to your card , but on uber app payment is still outstanding. And when you try to repay payment can't go through as you have already paid. Now situtation is you are unable to book cab. When you contact uner help, they are unable to provide solution, just tell to re-pay(which you can't pay as the app has bug) (also when you have paid earlier why you need to pay again).

Not happy about this service keeps double charging, if i open app to look at it i get charged!!! 27/03/21 Again I'm being charged multiple times for trips I'm not taking, you can't even contact customer services, this is deceiving and upsetting 😞 An Uber was meant to be on its way, canceled out at the last minute, made me late for work, sent a driver who was acknowledging yes, had no idea of his area knowledge

I cannot, in good faith, recommend this app to 99% of the people I know. Uber used to be good a few years, it was cheap and there were loads of drivers, wait times would be frequently less than 10 minutes, often less than 5. Nowadays drivers seem to be so scant I have no idea how Uber is still in business. Astronomical wait times, EXPENSIVE AS HECK. It's apparent that they've cut costs to deal with the pandemic and are incapable of providing quality service. Deleted, never using again.

Late night rides are the worst. They become so expensive to the point of a trip that's has always cost $8 to $13. Now it cost $40 to $50 for a ride that's $12. Even without traffic they put this cost. When it used to be most cost 12 now it's 40 to 50 and more. Only because 1 or 2 drivers are available so that means they cost more hell no. From being a daily and night user for more than 3 years, this app has become nothing but a money sucking company

Won't allow me to schedule a trip for later on in the same day, just keeps saying Error. I have a job interview and I'm obviously not going to chance it at the last minute to see if the error doesn't apply to spontaneous bookings. I will have to use a different company, it's a shame because Uber is normally more convenient. You need to fix the scheduled trips aspect on the app, if it's not a service provided then don't make out that it is. I have wasted time trying to get around this.

Customer service is none existent. I had several unauthorized charges go through and when I filled my "wallet" it mysteriously emptied. When I FINALLY did speak to someone they just listed the rides I had taken. I explained that the math made no sense and went through it step by step several times to show that a significant amount of my wallet was missing. The "person" I was emailing with just repeated themselves until they eventually stopped replying all together. Uber will rob you. Its a scam

I've be using uber for years and it used to be better than this. Now drivers take your ride, ask where you're going and cancel on you. There's no way to contact customer service to file a complaint about this either. A lot of people depend on this app to help their lives from going to and from work to grocery shopping. If lyft is available and nearby I use it over uber. Sometimes lyft is significantly cheaper as well. So uber in short needs to get their priorities straightened out.

I don't know what is wrong with this app. The fair shown to me before booking the ride is different and the fair show after my ride is completed is different. This has happened to me many times. Also some drivers ask for extra waiting if they were kept waiting for like five minutes. I just you do something about it.

In the midst of a pandemic when people are discouraged from using cash, it is therefore highly inconvenient when rides come all the way up to your doorstep only to then reject your trip because its a card payment. Its incredibly frustrating, especially when you're running late or like me, you don't carry a lot of cash on hand. Please adopt a cash float system like pickme so that both the drivers and passengers will be comfortable with card payments. Hoping for a swift and effective correction.

This has happened to me twice. I booked a ride and paid in cash ( payment option was cash) and then when i am trying to book ride on some other day ,it is showing the outstanding amount which i have paid in cash already. I have raised the issue but can't find any complaint calling no. Or any customer service no. how can i ever trust uber and book rides without being in dilemma that even after paying it in cash they will charge you that amount as outstanding amount on your next ride.

The only thing I experienced with uber is being charged fees because the driver couldn't find the pickup point. On the phone with him for 30 minutes as he drove back and forth past the apartment. He never said he wasn't going to come or say get another ride so you don't miss work, he just kept on going. So if you need a little extra stress in your life starting at 5:30 am, call uber, maybe you can lose your job too.

Real-time problem solving ineffective resulting in financial loss. Due to lack of communication scheduled pick-up time was unable to be changed to the correct time. My ride arrived at 1:45 in the morning whereas I wanted a 1:45 p.m. pickup. By chance I found out that the driver was arriving but my attempt to correct it were futile. Real-time chat or customer service is highly needed in circumstances like this.This experience was exacerbated because I was going to get my covid-19 vaccine shots

I w'd love to rate more. But the thing is that I have booked a ride from my house to malad, the driver told me that he has arrived.But when Ireached to the pickup point the cab was not there. I watched the status of driver in the app he was to reach after 15 minutes. I checked his location he was at Worli instead of Dadar. I called him but no answer for three times. What do I have to do I was late at night. I was with my family. I have cancelled the ride. You have charged me for that.

The app functions well for the most part. Its business practices are down right appalling. Try to find a driver, 1.5hrs wait while searching, meantime the app keeps telling you hey! This driver is available, only $75 for the $5 ride you requested. Over and over you get these. Then, when you quit guess what, there is "suddenly" a "surge" of customers in your area, the price is now $65 for the 3 mile drive. Has not changed in 6 months. $20 for 3 miles.

My today's trip had so many left turns. Each turn was a super slow left turn. Could the developers please learn from FedEx and make all trips faster by switching to right turns. Uber seems to have close to no idea about Toronto's construction work. To the extent possible can you please factor that. My trip took twice as much time it was supposed to.

This app is no longer reliable when you really need it. Its showed me from 12 AM to 5 AM that a ride from my friend's house to my house (3 miles) is $50. I get that there may be not as much drivers during that time but $37 for 3 miles?! I was essentially left stranded and had to stay at my friends house. The same thing with Lyft at $50 for 3 miles. They suck and they jacked up prices once they got popular.

Rip off service. I travel the same route every morning which it normally costs me between$7- $9. This morning. Dilan the driver charged me $26. I had always make sure I transferred way enough for my single trip, but when I checked my email tonight, it says, my payment was pending. Holly molly ...wth...is this. Now i refused to transfer money to my account.. but I want to still use it. This driver name Dillan.. please do not accept any job from me anymore, as i won't either

No point in scheduling a ride. They will cancel the ride right before the pick up window if the price has gone, and ask you to pay more (in my case, 250%). If you don't notice that it was cancelled last minute (no call, no text), you might miss your flight... Seems like a scam to catch people in a bind and make them pay as much as possible. I am deleting uber and switching exclusively to Lyft.

You're latest update that requires a photo ID terribly flawed. I was standard for hours based on a picture that I never had to take before. I have been a supporter of Uber for over 3 years and to have this happen is very distressing and awful. I need answers and a solution! You all should be ashamed of yourselves because of how you're doing Americans. I need resolve and satisfaction asap. Thank you

Beware of the book ahead feature. I've done it a few times and they've been super shady each time. The ride I booked in advance was $13, then about 10 minutes before my pickup time they say that there no vehicles...but I can pay $60...for the same vehicle I booked in advance. And of course the app doesn't allow you to contact anyone. We've been left in some really bad situations bc of uber. Time to go back to taxis?!

So we can't now order a taxi in a taxi app? It's for a while that Uber delays the taxi orders so the drivers arrive late: I've had conversations with drivers that all face the same problem. But today the app did not even bother actually passing my order to the driver! I've spent good 15 minutes trying to get a hold of him, had to order FreeNow, and obviously was late. What's up, Uber? You are not a taxi app anymore?

There's a glitch where I will go to send a message to a driver and the field will stay blank even if I'm typing, I'll have to close the app and reopen it for it to work. Also, the map to follow my driver sometimes freezes and then the line moves but the car doesn't, making it harder to pinpoint where the driver is. Lastly, it sometimes won't let me pick specifically where I am, but only a predefined pickup point which is really far from my location.

Over 20 mins wait times for drivers to pick you up & delays for over an hour for food delivery. Late to work multiple times. This has been going downhill since the pandemic but today was the last straw. Order was not accurate (wrong food sent), yet Uber has no problem taking my money. Canceling my accounts and switching to Lyft and Grubhub. I hope this company crash and burns.

This app used to be convenient, now it's just constant ridiculous prices for "busy fares" that go from $10 to $77, which take up to an hour for the prices to go back to normal, making the customers late or inconveniently having to spend an obscene amount of cash for a few miles!

Used to be a great app but it's been nearly impossible finding a ride any time of day for the past few months. This week, what was once a $12 ride is $65!!! Price gouging BS. Also have had drivers cancel after finishing their previous ride, left stranded miles from home even with a 5 star rider rating. Better off using Lyft!

Good 75% of the time. When it works it's great.. The fact that drivers can keep you waiting for up to an hour and cancel litealy within site of you, with no penalty, is absurd. Yet you will be charged for a cancelation and given a poor rating If you cancel for a legitimate reason, like the driver takes much longer than expected or the map just stops working. This app has been around too long to have issues like this.

It was good when it came but now its really hard to get customer service, rude drivers, poor support and the list goes on. It feels like it's more biased towards the drivers than the customers, as they asks for the destination and cancels the trip, wasting our time and sometimes even charged extra for. Hope they can improve their services without focusing on pleasing the drivers and increasing profits.

I don't have a problem with the drivers I get, but if I have to spend 15 minutes trying to get a late minute ride, but struggle to get your broken app to go into the accept my ride page because you did the slightest update, and I ultimately end up having to call a cab because your app refuses to work. Then your service needs a serious overhaul. I can't count the amount of times I've been late because your app refused to work, or gave me a driver that is 20 minutes away for no reason. Trash app.

Uber has gotten much worse over time. The GPS never gets the right location and the app itself freezes frequently. I understand that uber pool and express are no longer usable due to covid but the hike in prices for UberX is insane. The app constantly says that its busy and fares are 3X as high at all times of the day and almost every day of the week.

I have been having real difficulty with the app lately. The drivers are getting confused because this app keeo giving strange routes that does not work, like telling the driver to drive throught a station when there is no way through. I end up having to cancel because they are confused. It happens many time when i go to work as well. Giving ridiculous routes. Please fix this. Thank you

Can't find an email to give app feedback, so... App is good, service is usually good. My only real complaint is that it can be, like today, really super aggressive at upselling higher priced rides. Not just a few dollars more but like double the adverted price. Ride is listed at $9 to $11 and I am getting pop up saying 'We found you a ride for $24!" or for $38, or $45, and it's over and over and over and over again, nonstop. If I wanted a ride at that price I would have chosen Lux or whatever.

Worst experience all time these days. Even after making the previous trip payment it doesn't allow to book for the current. And the drivers are so unprofessional that they accept the trip and not show up upto the pickup location and doesn't cancel the trip instead wait for us to cancel and we lose the cancellation fees. I don't understand what kind of service Uber is providing it's getting worst day by day. If it was meant only for long distances please make sure you mention that in the app.

Over priced, ridiculous prices during peak hrs, they need to give out more promotions for rides and I don't mean 10% or 20% off 😒 at least do 40% off, prices are ridiculous now a days🙄 unless it's an emergency your better off walking or taking public transportation and now drivers can decline your ride if you don't accept their surprice charge multiple times in a row, best part is they'll be 2 minutes away to pick you up and all of sudden cancel on you and still charge you 🙄

Easy app but does not show everything on the app. I was charged but it's not showing up on the two devices I have this app on. When I email them, it's a headache to take it off of my account, even though it's a monthly charge and not an accepted ride. Monthly charges should be easy to take off. 3 stars cause I will still use this app but it's a headache right now.

The Uber service is worse now than ever. I still call Ubers from the same address at the same time as always, but it often takes 5+ minutes to find a car. Meanwhile nearby drivers are asking for massive fare increases, which aren't worth it or reasonable. More than once the Uber app has failed to find any driver available, but in reality they are all around but are so desperate for money that they won't take most ride requests. I only use Uber as a last resort now.

Over all good app. But their drivers are very much annoying. Everytime i book cab they firstly want to know about drop location if they are interested then only they move towards the pickup location otherwise asks us to cancel the ride, they deny their duty instead we have to cancel ride and have to bear cancellation charges. Why uber not work on that and why uber dont take strict actions against drivers who deny their duty. Thatswhy 1 star. Ola cabs are limited still their driver are good.

This service is getting more and more scummy: Drivers that will accept requests, but take their time on when they arrive. Drivers that are passive aggressive about not getting paid enough. Drivers that arrive late for prescheduled pickup and then attempt to rush you because they are early and their time is more valuable than yours. False "no-mask" claims just so they can force you to take a selfie, further infringing on your privacy. Uber is a dumpster-fire of a company. 0/10

I've had enough of the inconsistent charges uber puts on the card that's not reflected in what I select when I book my ride. My bank account constantly shows the ride being paid, then double the amount being on "hold" in my bank. Literally it translates to paying for the ride 3 times. No thank you! I think it's time the AGs office reviewed your practice.

Uber has been unbelievably bad lately. I can't even fit the bad into this short review spot. Drivers refuse to wait despite it being required. App will say drivers near by then say they can't find a ride and you go back to search again and suddenly the fare has tripled. There's so much more that shows this app has gone down hill.

This stupid app won't let you get a cancellation charge refund even for a good reason and there is no support. Driver refused the ride b/c I had a small bike. I called him immediately to ask regarding the small bike and did not answer although it is obvious I called for a reason. The app wasn't even allowing me type a message. The small bike fit in his car but he was hostile and and refused the bike and the trip. I cancelled bc I had to at the point. He said he would be sure i didnt get charged.

Uber is quick to charge you. After they quote you a certain price they give you a higher rate and charge you more at the end of the trip. When you call customer service they don't have a customer service they want to charge you for customer service. This is the last time I'm using Uber I rather hitchhike than to use Uber again. I wish there was a score that didn't have one star because one star is still too much for them.

I got charged for "waiting time" multiple times for no reason. I always get in the car the moment uber arrives. There's no way the driver waited for me. The charge is from a few dollars to a few cents, but it's the unfairness of the charge that is the problem. Also getting surcharges always no matter where I go. It's like the whole city is a special avenue or something. Fix your app and prices. If you want more money then increase the actual fare price. Don't beat around the bush and cheat.

Pathetic experience. 1 day it asked me to sign in. I had forgotten my password, So i started to reset it but it said it wanted to verify my account and asked me to sign in. How the hell will I verify my account if I can't log in. This was the actual problem that I wasn't able to log in and then you ask me to verify it. Moreover, there isn't any customer care no. available. Google says to SIGN IN your uber account to talk to customer care.🤦🏻‍♂️ How can i contact them if I can't login.

Terrible service. Nearly made me miss my flight. I scheduled a ride the day before my flight to make sure I had a ride. They confirmed and have me a countdown timer when my driver was going to show up. I was waiting outside and a while after, it just up and cancelled my ride. Now late for my flight with no recourse. Will not be using Uber ever again unless they can make this right. Terrible.

Not sure what has changed, but a once useful service is now COMPLETELY useless... For some reason, they have now started this thing where it says "We're busy, fares are a lot higher than normal. " during peak times. What used to be an $8-$10 ride to work is now $18-$33!!!! This is ridiculous price gouging... like uber knows stimulus checks are out... and it's STILL just as hard to get a ride. If i could rate lower than 1 star, I would!!! Last time using this service unless this changes.

getting "wonderful" offers from ubereats for $30 off use. They are fakes. As for Uber, I tried once to schedule a ride the day before a doctor appointment. I had a driver and a confirmation for 7am. A message at 7.30 driver cancelled and I'm charged around $10. Other times uber seems to work ok, but you can't count on them. Lyft has never done this and don't send offers they have no intention of honoring. A driver said they check tipping history. I always tip. Usually cash. Ergo bad rider...

The support team is terrible. I had an issue where the app is telling me I had an outstanding balance when I didn't. I contacted support and all they did is give basic trouble shooting. As a Platinum member with Uber I thought they would have given top priority to the issue because I was unable to request trips. Unfortunately it resulted in the support team telling me they are unable to help me at this time and showed me a Terms of Use policy instead of rectifying the problem. Trash service!

Easy to use app, but we often unreasonably high prices because of incorrectly calculated trajectories. From our home, Uber's price is consistently 50 to 70% higher than estimates for a taxi. Our drivers consistently get lost because the system clearly gives them incorrect trajectories. Worse, there is no clear way to communicate this to Uber. This looks very much like a deliberate rip-off.

The app has certainly gone downhill since the beginning of March. There are rarely any drivers available. And can no longer add stops. Everytime I try to I keep get an error code that says please try again. And twice I've been left waiting almost an hour trying to find a ride home from work. And once I finally get home the GPS in the afternoon wants to drive me all over the complex

I would give this a zero!!! Ridiculous and insane!! App is very undependable. I have had nothing but problems since I started using Uber. Can't add money to my wallet. Get the error message when trying to order a ride. Its disgusting that they don't do anything about it

I am not impressed with this app. When I book the uber, it shows price A but once the ride is over then the price is higher even if he took a shorter route. That leads to be looked into as I cannot always fork out money unnecessarily. I want my money back!!!! 😠

Worst app I've ever seen. It'll not allow you to schedule a ride in advance and after booking, drivers cancel the rides in the last moment as iñtercity one way fares are not feasible for them. I booked it for my parents from Mys to Hassan, drivers cancelled thrice and I had to book it through ola. Again from Blr to Mys, 3 drivers cancelled the rides n I booked separate package. Company needs a serious restructuring of fares. Ola looks more trustworthy than uber even though it is costlier.

Happened a few times Drivers accept ride it says wait 25 minutes , so you waiting 15 mins in the driver decides oh I don't want drive anymore (I'm guessing) then cancels ride now you have to an additional 25mins. That kind of sucks hope they get penalized after so much time passes by. Also I don't think the price of our rides should go up everytime we exit out of the app.I was about to request a ride sat my phone down to blow my nose my phone went to sleep, opened phone & price had went up.

I got a ride home when I was only 3 miles away, it costed me 77 dollars and the app said I went way farther than where I requested. I've tried to get the ride fixed and a refund of the exorbitant fee, but I've only recieved 11 dollars out of 77, the ride was only supposed to be 10 bucks, the map showed that I went all the way out to LA from where I live, which I did not do. I used Uber happily before this, but I will not use Uber EVER again after they practically stole over 67 dollars from me.

Can be very useful as a quick taxi service. This is of course area dependent but getting a driver that is covid safe is a coin flip. The help/feedback system is useless and pointlessly dense. Just know that if you have a problem it won't be fixed. UberHelp is just a faq with a lot of generic and generally unhelpful answers to a limited amount of questions and links to run customers between websites that are also just unhelpful faqs full of more misdirecting links.

They take out payments at random times. I have had the same 2 payments refunded and taken back out 3 times now. It is beyond frustrating when this app starts taking out money I already paid once. I am VERY upset. It is a positive that there wait times are mere minutes, unlike cabs. However if they are going to be messing around with your bank account, minutes ain't worth it. Deleting this app.

Excellent service, quick pickup, very reasonable rates, safe courteous drivers, I cannot express how much this app has helped me get out of a bind where I would just simply have to walk three miles in the rain because my car wouldn't start in the parking lot of a store to pick up groceries for ten dollars. I always tip well for my favorite drivers.

Do not use this service. Not only do they never have drivers available basically ensure you'll spend 2-3 hours trying to book a ride when you contact them they give no assistance whatsoever. The app is supposedly constantly updating so that issues like this don't occur but it's not. The app and the service have taken a serious nose dive in recent weeks. It's not worth your time. You're better off going to Enterprise or something and renting a car for a day.

Worst app ever..!!!! whenever i try to book a ride, it always says "payment option unavailable" "something went wrong switch to other payment options"..!!! Reinstalled and tried again many times. No use. Even deleted the account and created a new account with different email. No customer support. Down with Uber.

Usually since I've started using the app it's been great, but I haven't been able to get rides lately and seen that I'm not the only one with that problem, it left me at work almost stranded trying to get a ride for a hour. I hope it doesn't only make rides for people during the day; as a minor I also need night rides occasional and I think most others do as well, such as coming from the airport etc. I don't mind spending the money on rides.

This app is my main means of transportation currently. No matter when I try to select a ride it will always have an insanely overpriced fare and claim its very busy. Its just plain price hiking. I've not used it in a while now because rides that take maybe 5 minutes and we're costing me $9 are trying to claim a $75 price tag, NOT GOING TO HAPPEN. This needs to be fixed asap or I'm deleting the app
replyContent: Hi Kenny, this certainly sounds frustrating. We want to take a closer look into this for you. Please send a quick note to t.uber.com/contact so we can connect.

content: Terrible service , they charged me $24.99 for " Uber pass " & i couldn't even get a ride . i woke up to check my card and they took my money off , then they don't even have a number for contact and the one they do have is " for drivers only " this app is very janky and i need to know how to get all my money back on my card and i want to delete my entire account .

Uber driver app sucks I had an old account tried to update it so that way I could use the app I went to help section says to go to settings in the ap ( which is NOT there) no customer service support number to call. Nothing! Tried to then create a new account but wanted to schedule a ride for me that was way to early and wouldn't let me edit the pickup time. So I am done with them.

I didn't wish at any point of time that I would rate uber 1 star. I did not even wish to provide them any rating also. The new thing has came around uber drivers where you book your ride, then the driver calls you to ask your destination and if by mistake you do tell them that at this place I want to go, then they would ask you to cancel the ride as they did not want to travel. If it is with one driver then it won't be a headache but it is done by most of the drivers. I'm very unsatisfied.

When u book a ride, some drivers confirm the ride, then they won't come or pick up our calls! We have to pay for cancellation, but that's the only option! There's no way to chat or call within the app. According to them, now I owe money to them for a ride I didn't get! This is Uber for you!

Most uber drivers accept the trip and don't show up... This makes us cancel the trip because we have to travel in time... Very inconvenient and hope you can make a system to prevent no-shows... Also by cancelling we get charged and we do nothing wrong... Your customers are getting penalized twice for the mistakes of your employees...

I have given one star as there is no customer care number to address issues as below. We took uber auto rides in Jaipur over past few days & got ripped each time. 1. After trip ends they will charge you 1.5 times the original estimate app shows at the time of booking. 2. Even after you have paid them 1.5 times the original estimate they don't end the trip so you end up paying the 1.5 times fare in your next ride too. BEWARW OF AUTOWALAS THEY ARE BIG FAT CHEATS !!!

Simply Third Class app. There is no option to cancel a cab without cancelation charges. Now the cab driver doesn't want to go to my destination, he is neitger canceling my ride or not taking my calls, his GPS location is going far from me.. in this scenario also I can't cancel without cancelation charges. They are finding every unique way to cheat and loot customers. Ola is slightly better than these thiefs.! They can do anything because they have monopoly.

It keeps freezing. When i want to order a new ride , it gets stuck as if my last ride is still ongoing. I keep having to wait for it to stop/reload/get itself together and that usually takes too long. The only way in most cases to fix this issue is to uninstall and then reinstall. I just end up getting a Lyft or DAT when I am in a rush.

Uber has really gone down hill. I use both uber and lyft, as uber is often cheaper, but it's not worth the savings anymore. For example last night I called an uber from an airport. The airport, like most, has a designated pickup area from where I scheduled the pick up. I watched this idiot drive by the spot (well marked, loads of signs) three times then just cancel. 20 minutes I waited for what was advertised 3 minutes. It was advertised as $35. Uber says "finding you a new ride. Your new ride price has gone up" ONE HUNDRED AND TEN DOLLARS!!! What the BS uber? If my driver cancels because he's too stupid to follow signs, you don't get to more than TRIPLE the price?! I refused the ride and every one was coming in at that price. So I called a friend that I hated to bother and just had him drive me home. (My phone was dead and I only had uber on my ipad. I fixed that as soon as I got home!) When trying to reach uber, I got a message saying they won't issue more refunds to me because I've gotten too many. Uh So uber is admitting "we've screwed up too many times and won't be paying you back" Each and every refund was found legit. Drivers that dropped me off halfway through the ride because they needed to 'get home' and I'm stuck in a place I don't know. Drivers that smoked cigarettes. One had porn in his car to "cater to his normal clientelle" in reno. These were valid refund claims but uber says any valid claim in the future won't be paid out. So bye uber! And going to do as much as I can to make sure I'm far from the only one that leaves you. This review is step one.

It is a good experience and also an awful experience in many cases, as the service provided by this application is undoubtedly great and it also reveals various offers. However, the core users who render this service to the end customers are least bothered about the customers' severe need of accessibility in times of emergency. Unfortunately, if any cancellation is made by the customer due to the intimidating acts by the service provider, the customer has to bear the burdensome expenses.

Once a app which made going out a little easier in India... Nowadays the things have changed... The drivers have their own set of rules right now which includes demanding the drop location beforehand, cancelling trips if the user doesn't pay in cash, not switching on the AC either because of Covid situation or the increase in petrol and diesel prices...The company only cares about their commission and has an extremely bad support system...The situation with uber moto is even worse...

Uber has been great most experiences, app is user friendly and the only thing I wish uber could fix is allowing the customer to have the right to change drivers and reasonable prices instead if being stuck with a solid price and wait time. So it's a bit unfair that drivers can change customer and haggle prices but customers cannot which I'm the customer with no say just obligation to what's offered. 5 star overall rating tho.

Uber was great up until the start of march. Now suddenly I can't seem to get a ride at all. Almost stranded on 2 occasions because i thought it was just my area that was the issue but it wasnt. Theres seemingly never any cars no matter where i go. Ive waited 30+ minutes after trying several times to get a ride. And I'm convinced uber and lyft are working together. Uber won't have any rides and lyft will charge 80$ for a 20 minute ride. Looks like taxis will be a thing again.

Used the app to order food. It would not let me choose the CFA closest to me, and instead ordered from a location further away. My estimated delivery time kept getting pushed back further and further until my lunch break passed without my food coming. My 35 minute wait turned into 105 minutes.

This is my transportation to work and home, recently it has charges over 100 dollars wich triple of what they charge me. And the map shows plenty of drivers around, and it never is true. Always has to look for someone further away. It's frustrating. They need to fix.

Recently a new feature of uber is being seen....that is......the driver wont switch on the AC, especially in these summer months...though the price is steadily increasing....ok, we accept that the policy is to either keep windows open...or turn on the AC in fresh air mode....however, driver is refusing to turn on the AC in fresh air mode only.....so, it is requested to fix this issue.

This Uber app was ok at first, but while I was trying to get a ride back home the Uber app kept saying there were "no drivers avaliable" and no Uber driver was willing to accept ride requests either. I had to wait for 3 hours until someone I knew came to pick me up at my location instead, on a day I didn't expect the app to mess up like that at all. It was just a normal day and this wasn't functioning right at all. Because of this app, I was 3 and a half hours late to work after coming home.

I guess the app works fine, but it doesn't tell the driver exactly where to pick you up. It gives the driver the nearest street address which is not always Where You Are. I work for AAA and have to sometime get for a ride for our members. Sometimes we are on the side of the highway and the Uber driver simply cannot find us because he is being told the nearest street address. This is an issue that must be fixed to ensure the safety of everyone in need of a ride. Waiting an hour for a 10 min ride

The app is good, I've been using it for 4 years. But over the last year the service has really declined. I have to go through at least 4 cancellations before a driver actually agrees to the ride even though my locations are all within city limits. Very frustrating.

Unreliable for commute. Garbage time estimates. It doesn't work 80% of the time on my return trips. Uber pass for a "week" only covers 5 trips, cause people live at work. You still get charged for that cancellation because they are trying to send you drivers on the other side of town and you had to order a Lyft instead just to get to work on time. So instead of 15% off you pay 7 dollars more, plus uber's fee, making the 17 dollar trip ultimately cost 30. Thanks, I'll walk.

A few months ago uber is a great app the prices are far Tha drivers are friendly no issues but yesterday I want to take a ride 12 miles usually cost $15 and they want to charge me $87 really!!!!! Is like 4 times the cost I believe that someone need to take control of the prices I know they spent a lot of money on the prop 22 on California but really this need to STOP they need price control but for now I don't use uber anymore.

If it were pre-covid, I'd give it a 5/5. Now it seems it has become more difficult to get rides, and when I do the price fluctuates so much that I can pay $15 one day, and then $25 another-- for the same ride! I'd say use lyft but they're about the same case.

very disappointed that it's getting worst, no customer service, charge unreasonably and unexpectedly, portal sucks, lots of errors. 4 consecutive cancellations of a 1km ride appeared surprisingly within 5 mins, with the last one charged me hk$20 fee. Uber refused to resovle. seeking alternative now. Some other feedback says they hv call centre?? lol, where's in hk? imagination team in hk or staffs busy with tiktok that phone no. never disclosed. lol

Just a truly awful app that gets worse by the day. And their new "feature" that tells you about a ride available at a higher price every 2 seconds (literally) is spectacular! And of course when you are trying to just cancel the ride, the cancel button is EXACTLY where the accept higher price button pops up, so then when you try to cancel the higher priced ride so you accidentally accept, then when you cancel that Uber charges you a $5 cancellation LMAO. Just wow

I understand the reason(s) behind charging for a cancelled ride if the driver is already on the way but perhaps make it proximity-based? Like if the driver is within, say, 5mi? Because being charged for cancelling on a driver that's 10+mi out is kind of absurd. UPDATE: Haven't been able to successfully request a ride for weeks now, regardless of day or time, in what would be considered a fairly well populated city.

In my place, we use the metric system. My google maps uses the metric system. But Uber still shows after booking a car ride, that the car is a certain number of miles away (ie. the imperial system). There is nothing in the settings or option to enable me to ensure all numbers displayed are in the metric system. A message to the developers with this issue says that the account is not monitored. Maybe Uber is not interested in fixing it. Hence have reduced the stars to 3.

When Uber hires their drivers,make sure they understand the given instructions correctly.In more than a few instances, when I set a location for my driver he called me again just to know my location.The location is on the Google maps, why can't they just check and come where I want them to?Also, once I comfirm a driver many of them "cancel" the ride without notifying anything in the app. I wait for 15-20 min for them then have to draw the conclusion, "oh! I guess it's time to pick a new driver!"

Such a bad programming. If you already used your phone number for uber eats you can not use the same phone number for uber. There is no way tu sign in. Only option is to create a new account with a new phone number. So I should have a different phone number for each Uber app. Ridiculous.

Four days I fought with this app, wading through a sea of meaningless, unintelligible error messages and wrestling with unnecessary and intrusive "security" enhancements all the while having to go to an EXTERNAL help site, to try to get a ride, and in the end I was never able to schedule a ride. This app was not designed to make a customer's experience pleasurable and safe, it was designed to make some stuffed suite VP in a ultra plush office happy. Forget this piece of junk. Call a cab.

Uber used to be really nice (as long as you weren't getting a ride during a special event or from an airport). For the past few months, however, they've been taking weird routes (with no support to fix, change to the most direct route), and they have had a seriously lack of support (two incorrect ubereats orders in a row). No wonder there's never any drivers - uber makes using (and I assume driving for them) a bad experience. Rides now take twice as long on new routes for no reason whatsoever.

When I put in an address for pick up they always change it to another address a block or two away, have to keep changing the address back to be picked up correctly. The drivers cancel even when you see the car and are walking to it and they charge you a fee if you cancel your trip because the driver was taking to long or you see that the car isn't moving for several minutes and you cancel still they charge a fee.

This is the second time in just a few weeks that I have had multiple drivers confirm then cancel rides. Useful app, but it has screwed me several times recently and that's not okay. Theyve made some change recently that has made this much less reliable.

The app good. Rides have been timely for early morning in Ottawa. Drivers are friendly. The only thing of late I am not keen on is that at first when leaving a tip it reflected straight up when looking at my banking. A charge for the ride and then I would see a debit for any tip. Lately I see an initial charge for the ride right away, then a few days after a reverse refund for the fare and a recharge including the tip. Harder to keep an eye on for accuracy. Leave it ride charge, tip seperate.

It works fine most of the time I guess. I was very unlucky this morning. I requested a ride to work a day before I had to go in, but as I waited, no riders could be found. Even when I tried again, my ride was cancelled. Uber did refund me (thank goodness) but I had to miss work today because no one was really available to take me. 3/5

I've used Uber for 4+ years.in th last year I've seen them constantly giving me drivers farther away( resulting in higher fees for me), if I schedule a ride they don't honor their Uber pass(again higher fees for me) and I can't give compliments now. Additionally, their pass costs 24.99 for 10% off, I see Lyfts cost is 19.99 for 15% off. Umm I'm am done with this greedy rip-off company and will only use them as a last resort. That will be rarely(if at all) Uber is #1.. Raises middle finger......

It's good when they don't have random and extreme changes in price. At least Lyft keeps the price always the same in most cases. One day it's $13 to get to a place, the next day or even minute, it jumps up to $40 for the same place. It's ridiculous and unreliable sometimes.

It is high time UBER should have a 24*7 call support. You do not have a dedicated caht support for complaints or issues. There are just some standard predefined options from whicb you can raise an issue but they are not of help in all cases. Also the drivers call you first and ask you about the drop location and most of the time if it is not a long ride- the driver asks you to cancel. We wnd up wasting a lot of time on time with multiple drivers. It is frustrating.

The app is ok, but the GPS service doesn't always accurately locate where I am. The service has gone downhill, obtaining a pickup used to take 5-7 minutes, now takes 12-20 + minutes; and prices have increased by 50%, and I have an annual Uber Pass subscription.

Needed a ride to catch a flight, so I booked the ride to show up an hour before departure. The airport is 10 minutes away, so I'd have plenty of time to check in, get thru TSA, and find my gate. Uber confirmed that I would be arriving 40 minutes early at the latest. Despite everything being handled for uber so far in advance, they still didn't get a driver to me until 10 minutes to departure. The driver hustled but I still missed my flight. $30 to go 10 minutes and they couldn't manage.

Absolutely terrible customer service. I've explained to them 100 times that there is something wrong with the pickup and wait times, and the result is me being late to work. They gave me one $10 credit (which doesnt even cover the cost of a trip) and said "that's all we can do", when I'm still being late because they refuse to help me! Dont use them. I work at a hotel and wont be recommending them to any of my guests. Being a platinum member doesnt mean anything, they only care about your $$

This is the worst app I have ever seen. I have many bad experiences from the drivers as well as the rides..there is long request time and if any how driver accept the rides then they use to deny for the rides, Which in turn waste our time as well as money. And drivers are not willing to go to the destinations if they come to know about the same

Payment option to be changed mid ride to be made available. I wasn't able to change the payment method to cash or a different card because the application wasn't allowing me to do so mid ride. Sometimes there would be issue with our card or the internet and we would have to switch to cash or mauby use a different card or use other online payment options. This doesn't work mid way and sometimes work after the ride or that doesn't even happen.

After I switched to a new phone and redownloaded Uber , it did not let me sign in or have me change my password , the error kept referring to that my number is not associated with my current email address however it was connected to it. Fix your app if you'd like to satisfy and gain customers. What a shame!

The app doesn't le me sign into my own account, Tried it many times. Worst experience. Always an error comes that your number is associated with other account. And even if I get an OTP it doesn't let me sign in. Very bad experience with Uber. Never thought I would have experienced this kind of problems.

Previously this app was good but this year it was horrible......I have been paying for the cancellation fees 4 times in a month which is not my fault at all...if the drivers are not willing to drop us they should cancel by themself and not accept our request, so why are you asking us to pay? I am never going to use this app unless they rectify this problem. Are they trying to cheat us?

Sub- zero stars for customer support. If it isn't an issue listed in their help section, do not expect any real support. They do not have a phone number, even for technical issues. They do not read what you write, even if it is in response to questions they ask. The person who writes to you will not be the person who receives your response. You have to repeat your problem numerous times. It is an exhausting nightmare.

I didn't find my driver at the meeting point, I try to call him and he didn't answer. Then I see in the map that he is cycling around. I canceled and then I charged??? Really??? Your driver making cycles. And in the option "trip issue and refund" you don't have nowhere the "refund" option.

Edited* Fast customer service response. I had an issue and they were able to correct the problem incredibly fast. I'm very impressed. Thank you for the help Edit- seems Uber can never find me a ride. But it does find about 10 high priced rides from 50-100. Really? Sounds fishy to me. Edit againWhat a complete scam! DO NOT SUPPORT UBER! my price went from 19 to a MINIMUM of 60 and beyond 100+ dollars. Wow! Pretty obvious Uber is gouging like crazy. Wont be in business much longer doing that. Bye

If you need Uber for a ride, you can usually count on the app to EVENTUALLY get you one. Often, unfortunately, the app has problems connecting you with drivers and the drivers many times have difficulty finding me at pickup locations. Uber has been a hassle to use. I would never tell you not to use this app, but would recommend trying a competitor first!

I am from Tripura, Uber has started its operation just couple of months ago. Hence, they doesn't have long distance service. I hope they may start their long distance operation soon. However, Uber gives a hassle free and convenient ride. I strongly recommend everyone to download this app and enjoy hassle free and convenient ride. Moreover, their fare is cheaper than on road fare. Thank you Uber ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

I was checking out restaurants menu in uber eats by the order got placed automatically, when called restaurants they told to call uber support. Uber support got connected after lots of trails, the support guy was forcing to accept the order and wasn't willing to help. To top of it all uber had taken a wrong location and nobody actually arrived at my place, but support guy was forcing me share my address, when i denyed he said anyways I will have to pay charges, this is ridiculous.

Poor accuracy of rate when you initially request a ride. Estimated cost was $15 to $17, but when Uber started connecting me to a driving all rides were double the cost some even almost triple $33, $40 one even at $56!! I added the lyft app and got a driver immediately at the rate they disclosed it would be.

I don't really understand why there's no "support" option when waiting for my ride. Usually they tend to get even farther from my pickup location, not answering the phone, ignoring messages and it's very frustrating to wait way longer than expected just because the rider decides to ignore the app and costumers, and here I am, late to a very important appointment just because my rider is literally not answering, I get charged an extra fee if I cancel, and I can't find live support on the app.

There's a lot of things to be said for uber as a platform but I'm switching to lyft, I've had far too many scheduled rides cancelled on me, forcing me to resort to lyft which usually has a driver immediately available. I've had to shift too many appointments due to the incapable "schedule ride" system. You can schedule a ride a day before, 30-60 minutes ahead of when you want to be somewhere and still not get there on time. It's okay if you need to be somewhere by tomorrow.

Before February I had been using uber almost every day to get home from work, was always fine and was genuinely worth a 5 star review but for the past couple of months I have put up with being stranded at work at 11 or after 12 with almost no way to get home, drivers cancel and I get charged £4 every time they do, getting sick and tired of the frustration of just trying to get to/back from work 😐

4 out of 5. Great and useful app when the app wants to cooperate, but Uber has been getting real comfortable as of lately telling me there are drivers nearby, but doesn't send out a ping/notification to any of the drivers that are 'supposedly nearby' to pick me up. Very quickly becoming an annoyance when I try several different times over the span of ten minutes and it does the fake ping/notification.

I bought a new phone today and tried to move my Uber account over to said phone. Every turn has been nothing but a hassle. My password is incorrect. My number is already in use (no duh) and when I try to contact what customer service I can find, it's runaround city. I have had nothing but issue after issue with this app. I understand that some redundancy is needed for security, but I'm human and your customer service sucks. One star only because you can't rate any lower. Fix these issues, Uber.

I hate the fact that drivers already with people in the car could accept your request. Like I don't want to wait for you to drop someone off 10 miles away from me only for you to come back 10 miles just to get me. Drivers will cancel trips if the price ain't right. But I always tip so it ain't like they wouldn't have gotten little. No more tips and no more uber after today.

Uber is playing a game to drive up the rates. Used to be reliable. Now there's never a drive near by. The cost has gone up 40%. There are thousands out out work driving for Uber. But there never seems to be any available anymore. Like they are using the pandemic to justify SERIOUS increase in cost. Generally taking advantage of the people using the app. It's gotten so far out of control its $22 to go a few blocks after getting groceries at the closest grocery store.

The uber driver took a wrong route, I ended up travelling double the distance, I missed my bus and after the disaster they expect me to pay double the amount! They should be paying me for the inconvenience, but instead they are charging me double😠. I tried to talk to the customer care several times regarding the payment, I told them I'll pay the original amount, but they are saying they are helpless. I am not going to use the app until it's resolved.

They have no respect for the users, customer service is horrible. No call in support (unless it's a life threatening emergency) and message help center is useless. I bet it's an automated system that replies instead of a real person. No matter what happened they just don't care. Often times drivers accept a call, come a few blocks away from you, then they drive away on purpose so you have to cancel and they keep the fee. And why do I pay wait fee but Uber doesnt pay me for waiting or canceling?

The app was great at first. Now I can barely ever get a ride. Drivers cancel requests after completing one they're currently on. I have been left stranded because of this & had to use Lyft or alternative transport. I think drivers should not have the option to cancel once they accept a ride unless they have a fender bender or something. I am also a Latino that does not speak much Spanish unfortunately but many drivers don't speak English making it difficult to direct/correct the route.

Works when it works. Barely any drivers in my area and it dose show more one, they're glitch or something and don't respond to my calls. I use this to go to work and its expensive, anywhere from 12 to 17 dollars just to go 3.5 miles. All in all, use at your own risk.

Wow!  I scheduled an uber the night before for my whole family for a ride to the airport at 10:30-10:40am. Everything was confirmed and looked good. We were waiting outside for the uber until I got a message at 10:33am that the ride was cancelled!!!  With my whole family waiting outside!  You guys SUCK!  I am so furious I can't even tell you. What good is scheduling when you can't even notify the customer until AFTER the pick up time!  What a lurch that puts us in!  I'm so furious!

I stopped using Lyft because they kept double charging. But now on Uber I have literally waited over an hour just to get a ride home with some groceries. AN HOUR! At least 6 people in my area each time and not one will pick up my ride, as I watch them just sit in the same spot not moving... That whole hour! I thought a little fare is better than none within that hour. I guess not. I don't like the pick and choose, if you're available it shouldn't matter how long or short the ride is.

Absolutely pathetic experience, recently all available cabs are dirty and in a shabby state. Moreover worst customer care with almost non-existant ways to communicate with them. After raising a issue they dont properly respond with any corrective action and just revert back with a generic message saying we have noted your feedback and will try to improve! I didn't expected such experience from Uber. If there would have been a option to rate 0 i would have done that..

The experience is not so good with uber. Once the moto driver was driving very rough and applying unnecessarily breaks that tends to come closer. Also while paying the amount was trying to TOUCH the HAND that gave the WORST experience. Also in the last drive, the destination that was entered with the route however the driver skipped the route and followed another for the same destination that resulted in longer traveling time and increase in amount like I've paid Rs.60 MORE than it was decided.

Terrible. Unfortunately repeatedly had to wait over an hour for a ride, at which time the surge costs went up. This has happen over and over, over the past few months. Absolutely Ridiculous and terrible service. Very disappointed in Uber's service.

My only complaint is that I cant ever find a ride before 8-8:30 AM. Would be a lot better if i could go at 6AM when I get up. Not sure if that is the way the app works or if its because of the drivers in my area. Overall though very helpful when you don't have your own car.

Worst custome support system ever. I have been trying to regain access my account to my new phone. Everytime I got verified via OTP with my phone number but after that it says we can't verify that I am the owner. And the customer care number I tried was always switched off. No other way to contact.

I don't know if that's something more specific to Brasil, but the drivers, after confirming your trip, simply drive away from you cancel your trip. Several times. The drivers should be committed to your after confirming your trip. At least those drivers should appear in your past rides we can rate them properly, due such disrespect.

Literal garbage, I had checked out the app previously and found it useless and now that I am trying again the app refuses to let me log in with my existing account. It will not progress past set up without forcing me to make a new account. It is genuinely unbelievable that such a fundamental failure can exist in today's world.

Prices surges are ridiculous. Don't bother. They'll up charge you an absurd amount and pay their drivers the same amount. Uber continues to pay their drivers less and less per mile yet charge more and more. My advice: check Lyft prices before booking with Uber. These poor drivers trying to make a living are getting screwed, and Uber doesn't care a bit about them.

The reason why I'm giving it a 3 star it's because these days it takes me up 30 minutes or more just to connect to a driver. Even though the app shows me that there's one in my vicinity So I've learned that apparently drivers choose whether they want to take the trip or not. And especially if they see the fair is little they don't bother at all. So here I could be in an emergency or needing to get somewhere urgently but I cant cos the driver refuse to accept my request for whatever reason.

It was a nice app but now it is going bad. Need to wait for a long time for the uber car's. The driver on my last trip just talk to me once then didn't answer the and just drop sorry in the chat box. They told us that they will come in 5 minutes and delay for more the 20--30 minutes. Bad survive by uber.

Drivers do their best and unless it's the very rare occasion I get a rude or stupid driver I sometimes have issues with the app. I'll order a ride. The location won't let me change the location to my area and the driver will go where the gps tells them and not where I need them. Then they will message me asking where I am. Then the applications messaging function will force me to choose from three automatic messages instead of letting me tell them where I am. Good service, iffy app.

The app is telling me to pay the sum whereas I have paid the sum in full plus I didn't even take the change. I had a pretty good experience with the app until this happened, totally ruined my experience. I even tried reconnecting but it doesn't change. This is straight up cheating.

Uber and lyft have both been worse since the pandemic started. But Lyft is no where as bad as uber now. Prices seem better than lyft. But the app is so garbage id rather deal with lyft prices. Will tell you drivers are nearby and minutes later just cancel your whole ride and tell you no drivers are available. Its stupid, they need to implement the wait and save like lyft did .

Can't sign into app.Downloaded app and upon signing in with number or social I get "something went wrong, try again". Uninstalled/installed several times, cleared cache and data too.. no luck. Phone is pretty good using Android 11. No idea why this is such a problem. Finding a tech support number has been a painful as well. I guess it's still taxi for me :(

I set the option for online payment. The payment method didn't work so I paid in cash. Now I saw the pending payment warning and thought maybe it will go away when the driver updates on uber that it was paid. Andni didn't travel for more than month after that. Now when I tried to book a ride it says to pay the amount which I already paid. And the rule from uber is that they can't do anything if the ride was more than 30 days ago. Shouldn't you have a system for this kind of problem?

In KOLKATA now yellow taxi are getting more affordable to uber Just intentionaly extends and selects the longest possible route to increase the fare and if u take that route it will further add more charges in terms of distance, ride time , waiting time etc No longer an affordable and low cost service Need more operators to increase supply and competition.
replyContent: Hi Abinash, we understand your concern regarding the fares. The trip fare and dynamic pricing are subjective to demand and supply in the area at the time. It constantly changes with the rise/fall in either factor. For further queries, reach out to us at t.uber.com/contact and we'll connect.

content: Very unreliable. Drivers don't want to drive. They charge you if you cancell a ride, but when they cancell your your ride, which they do frequently, they don't give anything for it. I would only recommend Uber as an emergency back up for when you need to get somewhere now and can't wait to get another cab. Uber is the most expensive cab company around, short of private driver services. There cheapest cabs are commonly twice as expensive as regular cab services.

The App works well to request a ride but the experience has deteriorated over time. Ride options, cost of rides, ability for drivers to cancel and leave you stranded, and forced presentation had all gone down hill. Brilliant service, just sad to see it change this way.

My app doesnt show me where the cars are located and a couple of times I search for my pick up location and select it from the drop down button and then it sends the cars to a different location which forces me to cancel the trip and get a bad rating. And before I get a trip it takes money out of my account even when the driver cancels my trip and it doesnt reverse the transaction.

Nice concept with the wallet for payment. But can we get to pick how much we want to top up our wallets with? Instead of having just 3 fixed amount. How about I want to top up more or less, or what's not given in the option. Kindly see to this, thanks.

Lost access to my old email and phone # and now can't drive for Ubereats anymore. Can't log in, can't get any support. Some things are better left to humans...not A I So when I need help to recover my account, the support email says to get help through the app but since I can't log in, I can't get help.

Good app for booking cabs. Customer service is fine. Few suggestions for users: 1. Never entertain driver's request to change route, unless he/she agrees to not increase the given fare in the app. 2. Never use driver's personal meter. Use Uber app's metrics only. 3. When you reach the destination, do check the final fare in Uber app before payment, as it auto adjusts the fare based on the route taken. 4.Don't pay extra unless you want to, no refunds for that.

If you ever need to schedule an arrived in advance, please don't, they will never show up. Happened to me three times already. I was nearly late for my flight because of this. Other times with normal rides, there is rarely any drivers

For last some months, specially after lockdown, the service has been worst. The prices are getting higher. The distance I usually covered below 300 is now more than 500. The drivers have started cancelling rides for relatively longer distance or congested roads. It uses to take almost 30 min to get ride now a days. Whenever I talked to captains, they use to blame uber's recent policies. In short it is a downfall of this application, I think, if not properly addressed.

I've ordered ubers and the wait time had been longer then it would take me to walk and closer ubers have been unavailable. An option to select ubers before committing to payment is the issue here. I have paid three times to not get a ride to my destination now because ubers come from the city to here. I have previously cancelled to have re-booked and had an uber 3mins from my location.

Getting worse by the day! Now you can now only give a five star review to drivers. If you need to do, even a four, you can only select from a list pre-choosen by Uber with no comment section. Since you can't submit the rating without selecting one and there's no comment section, if you're problem isn't on the list, you can't submit a complaint!
replyContent: Hi Walter, we're always looking to improve your experience with Uber and we would certainly like to know more about this. Let us know about any such specific incident by sending a quick note to t.uber.com/contact or via the in-app Help section and we'll connect.

content: Wrost experience ..its happen to me so many times.. Uber drive keep me waiting for an hour then he cancel the ride but in return uber charge on me for this cancelation more over,there is no proper complain method.. Its happen so many time these drivers keep me on waiting half plus an hour(even they dont move from there place) if i cancel the ride then i have to pay charge.. Its so worst condition.so much loss

Horrible experience at LAX. When you request your ride it will show you a decent price but then shortly after it takes minutes to find a ride. As it is looking there are drivers offering rides for up to 3x and 4x as much as the initial price...all while the car is sitting right in front of you. Just take a taxi out of LAX and you'll actually save your money.

The update is becoming too much. Why should we be doing updates on an app every two or three days? Again tell your drivers to start their movement as soon as they pick a client and not starting it on their way to pick a client rather. At the end of your trip, you end up paying more than you are supposed to pay. My experience with one driver was terrible. Instead of me paying Gh6.00 I ended paying Gh23.00.

This is my first time using this app and its my last! I booked a ride that said 10 mins to get to me and all of a sudden it changed and said 25 mins to pickup, I cancelled the ride cause it was too far and these bastards fuvking charge me 8 dollars for a fuvking ride i didn't take. Keep that damn 8 dollars i hope it's makes life better thieves. No stars!

Good customer support when it matters, great uber drivers, and it doesn't require you to download uber eats if you want to order something. I would like Uber to maybe update their maps from time to time, but honestly it's not a big issue. I don't mind supporting other people's livelihoods. Thanks for getting me where I need to go, Uber.

Even though I've had a few good rides for sure... offlate, I've had multiple bad experiences with Uber cabs, especially in Mumbai. The drivers were rude, and unsafe. Another thing is that they keep calling before picking you up, even after the ride is confirmed, to ask where you want to go and then ask you to cancel the ride. It's very irritating. Uber help is not available for an ongoing ride. What if you are facing a problem during the ride. Zero regard for a customer's safety and convenience

Went from 5 to 3 stars to 1. Ill put it like this its not getting any better. The wait to find a car. Must not be such a good service to work for cause there seems to be less and less drivers. Just has to wait 15 mins for this idiot to cancel the ride when he was a minute away. Uninstall this app from your phone

Being charged for the Uber Pass with no option to cancel. I have been trying to cancel for 4 months and cant get any help from support. I have had a good experience with the drivers, just seems like an intentional move to make canceling subscriptions difficult, which is a scummy tactic.

Uber was great before the pandemic. Now it sucks. It always says it's busy so the prices are high. Drivers accept your ride have you wait 15-30 minutes just to cancel and have you wait for another driver that makes you wait too or longer. There is no number to call or email posted so if it's not a topic they have in the help area you're out of luck.

I was charged when the driver canceled my trip. This app is turning into a scam. Completely unreliable and overpriced. I used to love uber and I use it pretty much everyday, but the past several weeks it has been so horrible. 1 star is generous

Very bad experience from last few rides. Moto riders ask more than the rate and if declined to pay extra they ask to cancel the ride or cancels themselves and the fine has to be paid by the customer. No helpline number provided to contact uber help center to register complaint.The only thing uber does is they levy a fine. They don't judge who has done the mistake and for this reasons the rider is having the upper hand and they are now more demanding.

Usually the app works fine, but recently its getting very frequent that a driver cancels rides after 20-25 mins of wait and yet you get nothing for your time, after waiting 25 mins, it got really frustrating as the another ride again was 15 mins away and then cancelled.. There is no max number of cancellations that a rider can get at a time.. It wasted around an hour with no returns. I had to shorten my destination to nearby bus stand and took a bus.

Firstly I booked a cab since the app showed me the nearest available cab on 5min, after booking the cab the app showed that cab will arrive in 14min, so thought of cancelling the cab & the app shows I will be charged a minimal amount since the driver has already accepted my booking and later on driver calls me and tells he is going to the cab & will start shortly and later on the expected arrival changes to 18min. What on Earth are you guys doing? It is pity that I have to choose your service.

Great way to safely ensure you always have a designated driver, but twice I have been charged double for accidentally hitting the cancel button after I was already in the uber. So I paid twice for a one ride two times. Once I'm in the uber the location setting should know I'm already in the car with my driver but so my driver didn't get shorted I had to reorder my uber that I was already in. So 5 stars for the idea of anyone getting home safely but the app itself can use more maintenance.
