Good app but sometimes ver irritatingSometimes when I try to book a cab it searches nearby drivers and after searching for 10 minutes it shows no car available and when I reached destination using any alternate mode of transport after an hour a driver calls and said I've reached at your location and asking me to cancel but app asking me to pay money for drivers time. Just because of this I am deducting two stars from 5

In the past I did have good experience but in recent days the Auto drivers and Car drivers cancel at the last moment especially when the place is a bit far and also when it is a cashless transaction. Please look into this and hope it doesn't repeat again cz this kind of service is really annoying.

Terrible app! Tried to deliver a package with them. The driver that came to pick the package turned out to be different to what the app stated. Now my package is missing, I cannot cancel my delivery and customer service is terrible!!!

Always gets me where I need to be... Drivers can be unreliable at times. Sometimes the app charges you over what you deserve to be charged ( for rides and fees if the driver is heading the wrong way for miles and is not coming to get you at all.) A good system overall, needs to be reworked a bit.

Mostly great, enjoyable rides. I have had a few drivers in the last 7 years that seemed dangerous but upon a short phone call, Uber did away with them. They really do enforce safety of both rider and driver as first priority. Now, I as a rider can mark certain ones as my favorite and the app will first try to get my ride with one of them. If none of my favorite drivers are close, the app will get someone else close to my location which I am marking for pick up. I love it. I ride all the time.

I have no where else to complain accept here. Scheduled for a specific time, stood at pick up spot as the clock count down to zero -no ride- then app pops up & says driver will arrive in 20 minutes.thank you for jeopardizing my job ! I scheduled the ride because requesting one was canceled 3 + times searching for a driver ok fine so I schedule one instead. began requesting rides 1 hour before reporting to work & was still late. Not happy the way they do business takes $w/o accountability

Uber use to be great, now not so much lately you have to wait 25 to 30 mins for ride u wait then driver cancels and u wait 20 or 30 more mins. I could get a ride faster during the lock down. Several times no drivers available in my area really i stay in atlanta. Several times a ride that is only 6 miles they want to charge 25.00 i had that happen 3 times was 10 cleared it out turned in to 25.00 i caught the bus so hey save your money take bus and buy u a car. Uber is getting to greedy.

DO NOT USE UBER This is quite literally the worst app I have ever had the displeasure of using. I can't schedule a ride today or tomorrow like I should be able to. I have money and there are no issues with pick up and drop off locations, however when I try to confirm its given me 2 or 3 different error messages.

Worst worst worst app out there! This company has gone down the toilet. You can not even speak with them easily, they make you jump through hoops. There's less and less drivers available to pick up your food. Yeah uber refunds you but the last 5 orders (I can show anyone proof of this) were refunded because they couldn't have a driver pick it up and waited over 1 1/2 hours for a PRIORITY order. What good is a refund if the food arrives cold?! Uninstalling going with postmates.

The app crashed before connecting me to a driver. No information was shown after I re-opened the app. This resulted in an extra charge. There is no way to dispute or report these kind of issues. The app is designed to not allow you to directly contact a customer service rep.

The only issue is sometimes when i choose sedan class vehicle for classy rides, it turns into an total dissapointment- the condition of vehicle is just the same as UberGo vehicle which is unrepaired, uncleaned and not at all upto to the mark to be called a "Sedan", next thing i want you to always focus on the behaviour of your drivers, their behaviour sometimes ruins the journey we have with you . I hope it doesn't happens next time ! .

There is no cancelation button, only confirmation buttons. After a regular trip with Uber I didn't clear this app from phone memory, just I put the phone in my trouser pocket and there it made unwanted order for another 2 trips (the same Uber driver arrived, maybe wait 5 min and took 2x 4£ for a trip cancelation). Because I use a silent ringing, I didn't know that .. But the driver didn't show any effort to contact me. Another problem I see, there is no settings for taxi around me, how long I want to wait for (max 5min, 7min, 10min, ...)

For some reason you cannot add funds to your wallet anymore. The app keeps crashing when you click anything in the wallet. What is happening to your app. I rely on this to get back and forth to work. And now you cannot schedule a ride anymore!!! WHAT IS GOING ON!!!!????

The drivers GPS is horrible! They never pull up to my actual location and they always get lost. Then they ask me what route they should take when their GPS should direct them. I dont always know how to get where I'm going and I should not have to give them directions. If I have to give directions to drivers I should get a discount every ride! Also I use uber a lot and never get any kind of discount! Lyft is way better. Your price gauging is greedy too!

POOR EXPERIENCE! Many drivers accept the ride (just for fun) even when they are far away. They just keeping going away, don't accept the call and don't even cancel the ride. If we cancel the ride, Uber charges cancellation fee (what an irony). These drivers waste almost 15-30 minutes and we can't do anything for that. Uber prioritise the driver's interests while completely ignoring the customers. As per Uber, customers have a lot of extra time but every minute counts for drivers.

never use this service for outstation ride. they will show you one amount but final bill will come exorbitant amount. i book a taxi from mumbai airport to nashik. the amount shown was 2350rs. but final bill came to 3850rs(1.5 times more) for the same km travell. they will charge u extra plus their drivers are also rude and customer care no support to customers. pathetic service with extra charge paid.

Otp was sent but that otp is not visible in the app, in that situation it is too bad to move further, I have cancelled the trip due to not availability of OTP in app, cancellation charges applied,. This is too bad. Can you please correct this issue which may not happen to anyone.

I cannot open the app... I had contacted the help centre via email..provided all the required documents but still cannot open the app nd my account ... "The account is currently dissabled" this is the only message appearing on the app or even email... I had been trying to solve the issue since 2 months now but there is no help

From fare surge to many other problems (not related to the driver) faced can not be communicated by live chat with uber. Even a food deliverly service to DTH service has live chat options.Poor service at times & it's because of systemic flaws (not of drivers)..Very bad, costly service (in respect with other rental apks) & bad system.Bad pricing for consumers & low wage for drivers & another thing is my rating is kind of always around 4.85..which decreases when I don't use this apk for a while :p

$15 for a 10 minute ride, I might as well walk the distance. Oh and the driver wants to take our ride, but is half and hour away? Great. Not to mention it's the least reliable app on my phone, hardly ever works and my phone is brand new and runs everything flawlessly. Edit: the driver went the complete opposite direction for nearly half the distance of the original ride and then proceeded to take the absolute loner route turning a 10-15 minute trip into nearly an hour. Edit: they blocked my #.

$85 plus change for a 16 minute trip. Never reliable and majority of the time their is always a problem or the drivers have adeath wish while on the road. I am pretty much done with this app. I recommend going on a bus or carpooling with someone you trust.

Unable to talk to someone within the company. No phone numbers and no direct customer service and links. I can't verify my cell phone number and I had to use my emergency phone number to verify to gain access to order food. I will not let me go back to my regular cellphone number. It keeps saying phone number is in use.

Years later and still not available in my town. Available in the town right over.... Which is basically connected. There's no reason why it shouldn't be here. There are lots of people here who want to use uber, be it to drive or for rides, but just can't.

So, the app has a nice feature where you can see how far the people who are taking you places are from you. My only issue with it is that an individual could be 5 minutes away, you could be traveling 15 minutes in the same direction they're heading, but it's a 30 dollar charge. Or they won't even take your drive request. Just find some other way to get around. It isn't worth the frustration.

Since after new updates and Covid-19 lockdown, it tooks an eon to connect with a driver. Moreover that driver will be too far from my location and will transfer the ride or cancel it. I have observed that the number of drivers has decreased. This has wasted my whole lot of time. It has made my life difficult. I would like to request ubers to hire more drivers.

It's really frustrating when a driver calls and asks for the destination and then cancels the booking. The app doesn't even has an option to get help or raise a complaint in that situation and we just have to wait endlessly hoping that next driver doesn't cancel.

I am not sure if there was a recent update... but all of a sudden the app keeps freezing when I confirm a ride. I tried to request a ride in NJ for 30 mins and once I confirmed price and destination then the screen freezes and does not go to "find car" screen.

Uber has tripled their rates. I paid almost $30 for a less than 2 mile ride that wasn't surge pricing. The driver was blown away by the cost of the ride when I told him. They must have charged me for the full distance of the ride, which was carrying another passenger close to where I was. Uber double dips in their cars and rips off their customers.

Ola is a better choice with good customer support. I booked ride, paid the payment, driver received the payment but the app says I haven't cleared the fare. When somehow I finally able to raise the complainant, they turned down the request. I have given them all the details of the payment including driver's name. Worst service, hope I never need to choose Uber. Even if I pay few rupees more in Ola.

The most shittiest app ever, the uber help is the worst!! I don't know how can they be so irresponsible!! I have already paid the amount but it's still showing amount due and I'm not able to book cabs in it. I have already informed their help center but not yet fixed! If anything happens please don't expect any help from these guys its been 2 weeks since I have raised a complaint they replied and its not fixed yet👍.

The worst app ever, the drivers do not pick up the ride and some of them are also very mean. There was one time, i changed my drop off location while i was in the car, and the fares went from Rs450 to Rs980. There are many more glitches like that

After the new update, OTP is not coming after booking the ride..i had to cancel three roses and pay the cancellation fees.. highly unprofessional..how come a simple feature like this is not tested properly before rolling out? Also i cant raise a ticket for this for customer care from the application.. Pathetic experience

Good app overall but a Must Have Feature is that Riders should not be able to cancel the ride after accepting regardless of the reason. Develop an option where the ride can only be cancelled by the rider after 3 minutes AFTER they confirm they have arrived at the location. Majority of my rides are cancelled because the riders come to the location and make a turn before cancelling the ride. Riders who refuse to accept Card payments should have a negative impact on their ratings or accounts. Fixit

My drivers that showed up have been great. BUT... I made a reservation last night for a ride this morning. My ride never showed up. Then I had to go on app and make another reservation. The fair doubled. How is that right? I had a reservation and Uber never showed. Then when I request again, rates doubled.

Location centering no longer works when clicked on screen. sometimes screen goes off somewhere and you can't seem to find yourself or your ride on the map without having to restart the app. Other than that it is good. Maybe a few less drivers could stop canceling rides when they are almost about to pick me up. I don't understand that one.

The app has a few annoying lack of features, GPS indicates my house, history is set to my house, yet pickup address is always my neighbours. Escalations are often handled via a automated decision process, and if a unique category is not preloaded, good luck trying to get your issue resolved as even the human responses only focus on category selections instead of evidence provided or writeups.

I am so sick of Uber!!! Evey single time I try to request a ride whether it be short or long they NEVER have any drivers available! I even scheduled a ride for 6 o clock and they sent a message at 6:10 that they had no drivers available! Nothing works for this ride share service anymore. I am constantly late or having to reschedule. There are no drivers available they need to fix this issue!!

the service is good. cabs are always on time. my only complaint is that whenever i try to type in the "any pickup notes" bar, a calling option pops up. is this a glitch or something? because it happens all the time and i cant type the pickup note for the driver. look into this. AND also why am i being charged when the driver is cancelling the trip because his cab is not working?
replyContent: Hi Tridha, we're sorry to hear about your experience with the driver-partners. We want to look into this for you. Please contact our Support team at t.uber.com/contact and we'll connect.

content: More sophisticated than the competitors. Anticipates where I want to go, saves me time in requesting rides. I really liked the helpful sign facing me with advice from the CDC on how to prevent the spread of Covid19; the car was really clean and the windows were creacked open for ventilation; thank you my driver, Mario.

I keep getting charged when there is no cars available to pick me up. Or when a driver cancels on me because they don't like my dog after I tell the drivers before they show up I have a dog then they say no or when I cancel when they are 20 minutes away I still get charge. I have so many uber drivers telling me there is a pet friendly one NO there isn't I'm about to switch to lyft because uber is the most useless app I ever used thank you for making uber suck so much.

The dummas app keeps searching for a driver even if nobody is in vicinity. U cant cancel the search manually either. All u can do is kill the app and redo the whole process. U cnt even cancel a ride from ur end without paying fine, even if u are waiting for the driver forever and he just wont arrive. Until HE cancels from his end u cant even rebook. Not to mention THERE IS NO CUSTOMER CARE TO CALL FOR ISSUES. i dont think this app understands the value of a customer's time at all!

This is a common behaviour of Your Drivers to cancel the trip without any reason and you people charge the cancellation fee on us. I had stopped using uber due to the same reason. I installed it today and same thing happened with me again. The unprofessional driver asked for the destination and then cancel the ride. I will uninstall your app and will never use it again.

This review is based on the service I get from the cab/car drivers (not the auto drivers). It might take around 1 hour for you to get the cab booked specially in Gurugram, Chandigarh & NCR area. Drivers would call you to ask the drop location (which they should ask I believe) & then decide if they want to take you there or not. They might tell you after the call that they'll be coming to pick you up but then cancel the ride. Writing this after 3 bookings & guests leaving by Ola now. Thanks Uber.

Won't work if you travel to India, but installed the app from another country. Rides in India require verification codes to start the trip. You can book a trip, the cab will arrive, but the app won't show the verification code to start trip.

Your app and website sucks!!!! I have been trying to login,login and login but no.. then i tried to change my password, and still nothing.. i have been waiting for 30mins for a stupid verification number via sms arrives so i can change my password... but still nothing.. and i have been trying to use my number also but nothing still happens!!! I have tried every possible way but i still cant login.. thank you for the waste of time that i waited on just to fix my damn login

It is constantly glitching out. Also will often say that my payment option is not accepted. Even though it is my bank card I al we ays use and there is more than enough money in the account. Very frustrating. I have been trying to get an uber since 445 this am and it is 552. Ugh.

Ubers Interface is just effectively better set up, developed, constructed for an application of this form. The essential Overall-Control & Operation is especially very fluent, which is important when you are mainly using it along the way. Even the Payment-Process occurs completely automatically. No Double or Single Confirmation-Systems, no nothing. These are well-deserved 5 Stars for my Rating.

The app as user experience is nice, but the security and the support is dissapointing. Still making unathorized payments on a deleted card for me is unacceptable. Support would not go further investigating without providing 10 out of 16 digits from the card via EMAIL. I will only provide the last 4 digits. Uber, year number 2000 is calling you to update your security protocols.

Skipp this app , I orderd a pizza that was said to arrive with in 50 min when I look back they had change it to almost to 120 min because the driver had decided to make another delivery the opposite way from where i live . Canceling is so confusing and they tell you you might not even get a refund, so now I'm waiting for a cold pizza. The app is shady when it comes to delivery time and the refund process.

There should be an option to have drivers that aren't doing drop offs already. Why charge us being when it will be naother10-20mins before they finish the previous ride. I cancelled and magically aomeone is 5 mins away. Also the Uber gps is garbage.. That is also part of whta makes the drivers take much longer.

Uber app is not at all convenient now a days for office use ..... They didn't reach destination on time they always switch the trips to other driver and if you will cancel the trip because they are not reaching to your destination they will only charge you penalty. We can understand that Uber is growing but you are lossing the customer trust .. I am really very disappointed with this app I had to reach office by 9am I booked Uber Moto by 8:30 am but I got late and they didn't reach the address.

NO RIDES AVAILBLE.. for the last couple days there have been no rides.. there are "no rides availble" or all my drivers are 30+ minutes away. Ontop of that just to get from downtown back to my house its usually $23 but you guys wanted to charge me $100 which left me stranded downtown for hours, I eventually had to switch to lyft which charged me $60. I would rather catch the bus then ride in uber

I would give 5 except that I I wish that I had more control over the Family trips from my primary phone. I can't tip or make complaints on a Family trip unless I'm using the secondary user's phone. This is not helpful if the family member is a child or elderly. The primary account holder should be able to make changes when necessary.

I was wondering if there was an option available for negative rating. The app does not provide option to give details of the service.My trip was cancelled by various drivers atleast 7 times and everytime they asked for the drop location.Either Uber is not smart enough or drivers are making a mockery of the system.There is no feedback available for drivers who cancelled. Its not fair to give feedback to driver who finally agreed and that too because I gave him a false drop location.Waste of time

Uber's map is faulty, so cabs are late or cancel and Uber Eats food is often late and cold. Uber don't monitor their Support email so the only way to tell them is via a 1* app review. Map issue is at Arnold Road N15. The only way onto Arnold Rd is via Philip Lane. But for drivers on the High Road A10, Uber tries to route them via Drapers Rd and Eleanor Close. There's no way through there and never has been. This delays drivers so we can't rely on cabs arriving on time or they cancel.

Pathetic app, no way of giving any feedback on the app, no pin or code to start the trip or verification of the ride or driver, payment mode does not change from cash to card and unnecessary validation of card is charged. Mob no of drriver not shared for direct calling, no penalty for drivers for cancelling the ride at last moment.

This app doesn't work anymore. I used to use this all the time before the pandemic, and now when I try it just spins forever trying to find rides, occasionally offering a ride for something like 3 or 4x the price.

So, I've never had a problem with uber before, even when the pandemic is going on. This morning just took the cake. I had to request a driver 10 times, because nobody wanted to accept the ride. I'm constantly being late for work because of this. Although there is a bus that's 20 minutes within walking distance of me that runs, that leaves me to wake up at 4am just to catch to make it to work on time. This needs to change. If your drivers don't want to take the drive don't start so early in the m

I set a ride 24 hours prior to when I needed it, for 7:20am. This morning, I get a notification that they are finding a driver, and that my pickup is soon. I head out the door at 7:20, nothing. Waited for my ride until 7:30 as the app kept saying "pickup soon". Eventually, it notified me the ride was cancelled because there were no drivers. Could not find a single driver in my entire city. Downloaded Lyft and had a ride withing 12 minutes. Definitely use Lyft instead!

No cars Available???? How can you have ride share app with no cars Available? This is why I don't use this app any more because I can Never get any rides. That or my Ride gets cancelled every time. I haven't had a proper uber since January of 2019. Get better Reliable drivers or something! You're loosing out on easy Money.

App doesn't work extremely well sometimes. Reported a missing item for an uber eats order and I am yet to receive a response. It is confusing that Uber doesn't have more direct support for issues (i.e. some kind of support chat or direct e-mail account for the public to see) which is extremely surprising considering how large this company is.

There has to be some sort of penalty for drivers who make us wait and cancel in the last minute. This has been happening to me multiple times. U ask penalty from us if we cancel a ride but how come there is no compensation for our time wasted.

Usually a great app but ever since the beginning of March I can get no cars anymore. I was stranded for an hour in a different city because they couldn't find a car anywhere and now everytime I request a car there's always no cars available. Which really sucks since I use Uber to get where I need to go.

I've used uber to get to and from work for a while and they just implemented an identity verification system THAT DOESN'T WORK, every time i try to verify it just sends me back to request a ride then it tells me i have to verify AGAIN, the first time this happened i was litterally STRANDED at work until someone could pick me up, I'm writing this review because it's happening AGAIN i am STRANDED at work a SECOND TIME 0 out of 5 stars EDIT: support team LIED "gift cards don't need verification"

The app has now decided to show me totals in US funds despite my being a customer for years, not changing any of my information, and never having ordered food or rides in the US. And of course, no option to contact unless it's involving a specific instance, which I won't put through as long as it lists the USD total.

I am an old user just installing it on new mobile. Now it says can't register because you have opted out of receiving messages. So send START to some number. When i try to send, message fails to deliver. Not registering through mobile or email address. What nonsense is happening?

The prices are absolutely ridiculous. Also it would be cool if you guys would tell us how much the cancelation fees are because I scheduled a ride for the wrong time on accident and now im afraid ill be charged for canceling. You guys are vultures and its disgusting. I had no choice but to pay $30.00 for an 8 minute ride. RIDICULOUS!!!

Can't schedule a ride, put money in my wallet and still can't. Now I'm out of $25 for nothing with no way to the airport still. I uninstalled and then downloaded again. Updated version doesn't have help option so I can't reach out for assistance to ask why the app keeps giving me an error that says try again when I attempt to schedule a ride. Very annoying & inconvenient.

I use uber all the time but as of lately it's been getting ridiculous I have to wait almost 30 minutes for a ride then sometimes in less then 3 minutes the price jumps for $9 to $26 for a 5 minute ride I understand that the price of rides fluctuate but a $17 dollar difference is alot especially when the ride is usually under $10

I needed to get somewhere really fast, had a Family member dying in the E.R....UBER kept canceling my Ride Requests....Turns out my Credit Card on file had expired and needed to be updated....I really wish the App told me this to begin with, because I lost a precious 25 minutes waiting and trying to figure out what was going on....My Family member literally died when I got there, before I could get into the Building.... :(

It has become the worst app as they have uneducated captain. Their captains ask where to go after confirming trip and then keep on tramsferring ride without thinking that the person is getting late because of them. Secondly, when the captain comes, he asks what fare is application showing and after knowing it they end up the ride and say that give us the exact amout after reaching the destination because the uber app cuts a large profit.Uber should focus on providing dropp off and other things

Very very poor customer service, you cannot get a live person to dispute your charges due to driver's errors. Unfortunately, they will still go ahead charge you EVEN if it is their driver's fault. I am done now with Uber. Lyft is so much better, you get to chat with someone online even if you cannot get them on the phone unlike Uber, you can't get someoneto help you. Never again with Uber, UBER SUCK!!!! UBER ROB!!!

It used to be a preferred option until recently they have started taking customer for granted and avoiding their concerns completely. Will recommend to use other service providers as they do not have a customer service dept you can speak with and hovering over the options on app is a nightmare.

Most stupid customer support system. Most stupid app ever. You can't reset your password. You can't log a ticket for it coz the app tells you to go on the site and the site keeps telling you your session expired everytime you finish filling up the form.

Why is it so hard to fix your map issues..in some other apps they allow to choose the most easiest toute and the most convenient route..but for me all the time uber by default select highways to travel why is this? And the prices comes with respect to highways. We as customers pay insane amounts of money due to this reason..please resolve this asap..

Uber has become a sort of necessity these days in the absence of other modes of transport and uber is exploiting this. There is simply no mode available to user to connect to customer care once a ride is booked. When cab is booked for office but the driver simply doesn't move from his spot , what can the user do? The driver calls and then talks rudely , what can we do ?

Application is very easy to use & very convenient to book Cabs,Auto. Prices are very reasonable. In terms of Payment there are options there & sometime they also provide some Offers which is very good. Just one think there which I don't like about uber there is no options to Chat with Customer care person or Any kind of Contact number. Add more Payment Options in wallet section.

I have using uber since long but till now there is not even a single trip where I did not face an issue to report but the help mechanism of this app is even more worst that you can never get your issue resolved. No call support is the worst thing this app has. M just done with this app. Due to urgency I had to take this services always but now I'll just shift to other apps like OLA. Terrible Experience.

Very unprofessional and annoying app. Idk why uber hires drivers who accept a ride and make you wait for over 20 mins, only to cancel the ride at the very end of it. And even if you complain to uber all they say is that they are sorry for the inconvenience. Not professional at all by any means! Pathetic!

Reason y its not a 5* is beacuse of the drivers. I was 30+ min late when i set a ride a 1h before my time i needed to leave. When my ride was coming to pick me up said 16 min. Then not even 3 min later he took another trip so it went up to 46 min. That is a great way to lose my and others business. Now i cant rely on the servive. So i will not be using this anymore. Until you adress this. Edit: same issue but now i cant cancale because of a fee when hes not on hes way to get me GET BETTER PPL.

Decent app, regardless I still use it because it becomes necessary in unexpected events. Some problems ive encountered with this service though have been: 1. Freezing app, have to open and close it to get latest update of my pick up location 2. Drivers abandoning my pick up without cancelations 3. Drivers purposely taking longer routes to get more "points" I would also suggest being able for women customers to choose female drivers for late night trips and likewise for female drivers.

Uber has become worst. Don't rely on it when you commute. I wait 20 mins for the driver and all he does is cancel when he's 5 minutes away from my pickup location. And I feel like Uber has been cheating me lately with the fare price. It will show less price when you book but later it will show more because the drivers wantedly pick a long route. Be careful. Uber service is worst and this review if for UBER INDIA- HYDERABAD. Better to prefer Ola than this Uber.
replyContent: Hi Keerthana, we're always looking to improve your experience with Uber. Anything specific we can look into for you? Let us know by reaching out to us via the in-app Help section or by sending a quick note at t.uber.com/contact and we'll take it up from there.

content: I had to cancel two rides. First driver kept me waiting for more than an hour. He was just roaming around and didn't even canceled the ride. So i was not able to book another one. At last i had to cancel. Other driver's license plate number was different. I then booked OLA(better that uber). Won't be using uber any more. Also no support system is provided insode app. They expect us to write email afterwards. Are bhai jab paisa aur din barbad ho gaya uske bad mera email pd k kya ukhad loge

Literally the worst app, the drivers are just too much to handle , don't get to the location at time , just wander here about and then cancel the trips , and we have to pay for their waste of time , and what about us . When some one is having a medical emergency and these people are just in their own world who are we to blame. Literally the worst!

I need to use this every once in a while cause I'm handicapped, and I'd like to give 5 stars, but I cant cause I've had so many technical errors. It would never take my old debit card for no reason, and now, it wont let me scheduale a ride for later. Tried everything. Just dont expect much from this anymore.

Uber has become more expensive for some reason this month. It says its Busy at the weirdest times and making rides that are usually 10/15$ to 40/70$. The ride is usually about 10 minutes too. Cant say I hate uber cause it's been fine till now but I wouldn't reccomend someone using it during this time.

Lots of hidden fees. They said $25 ended up paying 30+ Yeah tax but all the other surcharges not mentioned in the cost upfront. Cuz you will then probably will be discouraged from take uber. I want to see total tax and fees all in. Also does not handle pickup time change. Had to cancel and redo it.

Terrible service lately. As a company they are okay. The majority drivers on the other hand are a bunch of crooks. They accept the trip and tell you to cancel knowing you would have to pay the cancellation fee and they get money for doing nothing. I've taken screenshots and today alone it was done to me 6 times. I drive every day so now I'll be deleting the app and downloading Bolt. Then they rate you poorly and the good drivers have doubts to pick you up. What a disappointment

1. When using Uber ride it selects shortest route automatically but sometimes that route / road is not comfortable and we as a customer want to go via another route. So please provide option of choosing route to customer. If we provide multiple stops the fare increase and many drivers dont know how to handle multiple stops in a single ride and they end ride in between. 2. Very difficult to contact customer care specifically for any issue which is not related to a ride.

I paid for my last trip but it's showing I haven't paid it. It's asking me to pay before taking my next trip. I won't pay since I have already paid for the same I did the payment through Gpay and the payment was successful I showed the same to the uber driver and confirmed. It's been 2 days I'm trying to reach out to uber customer care to update my account but I'm not able to reach out to the team very disappointed with uber customer service. Please get in touch with me and resolve this ASAP!!!

Can't login. I got a new phone number I can't login cause the phone number is tied to someone's email address and account. Ive emailed them and they have fixed nothing. Oh well I use Lyft 10 times a week and doordash 2 times a day. Their loss I guess.

App has a tendency to experience an error when requesting a ride, then locates a driver without notifying you, forcing you to pay cancelation fees that are just as if not more costly than the ride itself. Bad app that exploits both drivers and consumers, look elsewhere for these services, life Lyft.

Hi, I am feeling very disappointed and insatisfied by writing this email that today i had booked 2 rides for pickup in noon and drop at night but all my rides were cancelled by driver, when i contacted them they told me i will take 20 minutes to drop the already booked paasenger and then only they will come to me but after 5 minutes all rides were cancelled by drivers and it wasted my 1 hour in waiting for cab. While booking cab i noticed all drivers are saying first they will drop already b

App and all is great but the drivers sometimes are the worst. I tried booking my cab 9 in the morning it took me more than 30 mins to book the cab, the drivers kept cancelling only because the fare was less. Because of this I was late to my office.

Good luck being a rider and trying to talk to anyone for being charged twice. It is clear that this app and its website were designed specifically so you cant get help as a rider. Very poor customer service, just goes to show how much they dont care about the people using their app

Horrible support system. The most pathetic experience is when you have to reset your password for uber account. It goes in circles n circles and the reset link expires within 2 mins. The whole purpose is defeated when the password reset/account access link can not be submitted. I'm facing utmost discomfort in only accessing my own account for which i have forgotten the password. THIS APP IS USELESS WHEN IT COMES TO UPDATED SOFTWARE.. IT'S SO DISAPPOINTING TO SEE UBER FAIL IN SUCH SMALL THINGS!!

I Put my number down to log in . It Send me the verification digits to get in. Than it ask for my email than it says my email has been used before. So I Go back to add threw social media using the same email . Than put my same number again . It says it send the code but this time it never did .. can't even log in . Never even order a Uber and already having problems, what a waste of my time. I'll pass .

App says..."Something went wrong, please try again." after i type in my phone number. What is wrong with this app? Works fine on pc. Zero support. No answers. Why wont it take my phone number or even Google Acct. Waste of my time. No way to get an answer.

I like the app. I only hope they work a little more with AI to consider what's best for the customer. Everywhere in the world, I've used this app and it works really well. In Egypt, however, I wish there is a way you could recommend good drivers to good customer based on the experience we share as customers. I just don't think that's the reality even if that's the intention. I wish to see some updates in the near future.

Not good experience Most of the drivers prefer cash payment. Frequent cancellation without solid reasons if opted for online payment option. App works as per the convenience of driver not customer. Bad experience, not good for company. Company must do necessary action to improve services.

Hi Service provider, Had a query, when booked a cab, cab driver will not come to location & won't cancell the raid No way to talk to your customer care representative, *"soo disappointed"* No option given to complaint on these kind of drivers It would help riders if you provide a solution for this case

Getting a ride it seems now is literally impossible, not to mention, no fixed rates so you could make the same trip and never pay the same rate. Just attempted to get a ride that is literally about a mile and a half away, and UBER wanted to charge 20+ dollars. Ridiculous.

In the past, I've had great experience with Uber. I recently used the service for a ride to the airport. They charged me 3 times for the ride. When I notified them (twice), they only refunded 1 fair. Disappointed.

So far It's a good app, except that most of the time i have to try multiple times to get the app to find a driver. A lot of times it is difficult to find a driver, but the so far the prices are good. It does get a little pricey sometimes.

Uber drivers denying destination The steps to follow Uber booking.. 1. Book a cab in app.. very smooth 2. You will get a call from driver and they will ask very politely " what is the destination sir" 3. After few min.. you will receive a notification saying that the driver had to cancel.. 4. Repeat the steps 2, 3 till any driver accept your ride.. I request Uber to change UI that your driver is still on the way.. he may deny your destination..

I have paid bill by using Phonepe but still reflecting unpaid. I have complain about it in help section for 4 to 5 times but no help. If you are not able to adjust it or you will demand the same from me I will file a complain in consumer forum for cheating in this regards as I have the proof of payment.  So, you are requested to do the needful at the earliest

Great to see that once this app/company got popular, they gave up on quality. App has problems with features not working or missing, and unless you're a driver, you have to PAY to be able to contact their support line. No wonder their competitors are doing so well.

1-liner. Fire your product team I used uber 3 months ago for a ride. Selected online payment. Payment failed. I paid cash. No pending info from app. The next time I opened the app, I was asked to make payment to proceed. Now its 90 days problem and Uber doesn't care. QA/Prod- Miss more scenarios. Good work.

Before going somewhere check if you would be able to request a ride back. Took Uber to work on Sunday (no bus service), but wasn't able to request a ride back! Only option available was to send a package. Why do you offer a package delivery, but no ride?..

For some reason, no matter what time of day it is--including 6 a.m., which is at least an hour before rush hour--the fares are inexplicably high due to "high demand." I wouldn't mind if the money actually went to the drivers, but we all know it doesn't. That, plus long wait times, has made it frustrating to use this app lately.

Bad experience . No check and balance on drivers. Firstly, they keep on asking about destination and cancelling the ride. And then, after accepting ride and keep the passenger wait for 20 minutes and then cancel the ride when u reach at the stop. Extremely disappointed.

The app used to be one of the best but of late the app calculates longer routes and charges u more which is disappointing considering I have been using this app for years now.. the competitor Careem gives u lesser rates than Uber.. and it's been a while since the app has had any promotional offers..

This app has the worst customer service you will ever experience. No way for a rider to talk to an agent about a problem. Just the automated robots giving pre written responses. Use one of the many other apps available unless you like talking to a wall

The app has its pros and cons It's convenient when you need a quick ride however sometimes depending on the time and the weather the prices can be ridiculous. The drivers are nice and it's a shame that even with the high prices it doesn't even go to the driver. Also sometimes the addresses aren't always accurate on their GPS's

Very bad service... Uber ride got cancel again again and again and its quite frustrating... They make us wait for a long time and then cancel the ride themselves successfully wasting our time... Plus there are many times when i paid much more than the amount showing up when i book the ride.. once my rent was 520 and i paid 1101 Next time after waiting for two hours and cancelling of 7 rides i got a driver and i was charged 2624 while the rent was 652... And last time my rent was 682 and at the

The final straw was a driver telling me to cancel the ride. I was on my way home from work. They can manually cancel the ride if they want to. But afterwards when I told him I'll be in contact with support he kept trying to pick up my ride again so I HAD to use lyft to avoid him. And Uber support is useless too. All they do is throw pocket change at you and give you the same cookie cutter response for every single different incident. I've had a driver literally scream at me and it was the same.

Uber is charging fee for everything, share rate, waiting fee (even when you are at the meeting point at time) and other fees. The app should show and explain this fees when you are accepting the ride. Uber please revoew how the drivers are charging this waiting fee and limit the number of times Drivers can reject a ride. The cancelation it's other behavior Drivers are adopting. Check this issue as well. The services given by drivers are importan for users too.

Customer service sucks if you have a log in issue.... They send you on circles acting as if their help center actually helps... There is no one to talk to a human or get a response live chat... They send you verification codes to your phone yet they still want your password even though the issue is you dont remeber your password. You put in your number and it sends a link to the email associated with that number so if a customer had your number prior the verification gode goes to the email.

Wouldn't recommend can wait around for 25mins or longer only for the driver to cancel 5mins from the destination. Yet when we cancel we are charged. Their customer support is terrible, there is no way to call them the only way to contact them is via in app platform which can take several days for a response..

The cost is too much. The uber pass used to be 14.99 and you could get up to 15% off. Now it's 24.99 for up to 10% off of hiked pricing...🤷🏻‍♀️ but it is a service that I need to get to work, so beggars can't be choosers.

Uber is handy but this is really going downhill. Today I had a driver who missed two turns toy pickup. Then pretended he picked my up until the ride was cancelled (most likely because GPS positioning didn't match obviously). And the worse is that's there isn't a way to speak to someone or report that behaviour...

Worst experience ....the app showed some problems while paying via Amazon pay so I was asked to pay cash by the driver but then the money was again charged in my Amazonpay app . I would like to have a refund of the extra money I was being charged for nothing . I hope action will taken on this .

Good app, Wish it had a feature where you could pay to go to multiple places... For example If I wanted to uber to the shop and then back home, it would mean ordering two ubers... It would be helpful to have section where you can pay for a round trip on a uber, I'm a single mother with no car so I always need to go to the shop which is about 30 min walk, I have a baby and toddler that I must take everywhere, a round trip uber option would be so helpful.

I signed up to ride and had no problems until I wanted to add my new debit card which is tied to my bank. The app would not accept my 3 cards or my PayPal. Now I guess I'm stuck using Gift cards which get flagged all the time for fraud so I keep 100$ in gift card amount in my account. Frustrating because PayPal says there's nothing wrong and nothing at my bank. Google gets too involved with your payments.

I'm never gonna use this app anymore. Today I had to face a very bad experience with a driver. Apart from his misbehavior, he even left us in the middle of the way. He made us wait in the pick up location for more than 30 minutes and after entering the cab, he kept telling us that he doesn't know how to navigate. He even said that, he'll leave us in the middle of the way, because he is running out of fuel!!!!! It was a ridiculous experience. Never expected such an experience from Uber.

This is ridiculous, Uber disconnects me several times and charges me every time. I ALSO HAVE TO WAIT UP TO. MINUTES TO GET A RIDE, NEVER CONNECTS ME WHEN APP IS CURRENTLY UPDATED...STOP CHARGING US SEVERAL TIMES...CHARGE US WHEN RIDE ACCEPTS AND IS ON THEIR WAY TO PICK US UP...UBER IS STARTING TO SUCK...!!

When I'm trying to book a auto , I was not even notified that trip was accepted unless driver called me. App just shows "n driver's found nearby you". As it was not showing the location of the vehicle I cancelled my trip due to which I charged for small amount.

Uber is great. The drivers are on time, you get to see their location, time, profile pic, and description of what they are driving so you want be getting into the wrong vehicle. In addition to that you can share your location with others so they too know were you are and everyone feels safe. The app is easy to use and with each ride you get a confirmation email and text. Don't just read about it give it a try. 👍😀

The app won't let me log in. I've texted "start" to the number it tells me 6 times, and nothing changes. So then I try using social media to log in instead, and I go through the steps only to be brought back to the same page to enter my phone number every time. Obviously sticking with Lyft from now on.

Worst application, don't ever use it. I had constant Cases where even when I have confirmed to driver through messages and calls they still cancelled taxi even after confirmation on calls... Application focuses on trying to make money with no rude so use local taxi and application as much as possible to support local business and only when you really need, use this application.

Earlier the experience used to be good, now they have raised the prices alot, waiting time has gone to 40-45 mins from 5-15 mins previously. Drivers cancel the cab or do not take bookings and Uber is literally spoiling not just our experience but our time as well. Disappointed

I m going to uninstall uber because now a day while booking a trip the fare it shows will be too high compared to initiai fare , it happened with me 4 times . I am really disappointed by this fact even after being an customer before any of the options available in market.

My experience has always been nice apart from few trips, where drivers argued, misbehaved and cancelled the trip. But in recent times, drivers are not willing to turn on the air condition. That's becoming very disgusting. Fares remain same in spite of no acs. Of course there are exceptions. So if these problems are sorted then uber will be a 5-star.

The app is great generally but in one thing. You can't report or compliment about requested drivers who still didn't pick you up. For example, i have wait 40 minutes extra for the driver who were supposed to pick me and later he cancelled picking me up. And i can't report him. That is totally a bad thing about this app.

In the last week I have been charged double what I was quoted in error that took several days to correct and had a driver cancel on my wife and I leaving us stranded at the airport once he realized where we were going. Unreliable and way too expensive.

Not able to add Amex cards as a payment method, and this is a reoccurring issue coming back again and again. You should test you're changes thoroughly. Also there is no way to add credit card as payment method via other uber app or website, which really doesn't make sense.

*updated* The ability to see the map and how many and where the drivers are is really disappointing. If I can't see how many active drivers are near me, directly impacts whether or not I use the app. I have a pic if your interested. I tried to connect. Links are invalid. There's no other way to connect.
replyContent: Hi Erik, we're always looking to improve your experience with Uber we would certainly like to know more about this. Send in a quick note to t.uber.com/contact and we'll connect.

content: Just I have checked that not showing correct location in uber app. As I have booked ride to Etelligens technologies but driver drop me old address. Please update navigation map in app. I have paid extra payment from initial. NOW this app is showing after 1 year that I have not paid previous ride payment. So I will not use of this app in future. May be driver cheated.

This app was once good, but now its godawful. The rates are ridiculous, the arrangements for convenience when planning ahead barely work and driver availability seems to not exist till it "gets bsuy", making a 12 dollar ride jump to 38 dollars. Ridiculous.

Requested for a ride out of town twice and got zero luck, shows a ride available but it shows in the app as none available, because of it i have four charges to my card, not in a happy mood and have to cancel my vacation because of it, thanks uber :( Edit 03/23/21 Same thing again, except that getting an uber is almost non-existent and you have to have very good luck to even get one driver

It was overall perfect! My driver was very personable and the conversation was great!!! My ride showed up in a resonable amount of time and safely got me to my destionation. MUCH BETTER than lyft!!! Lyft was trying to tell me i would not be picked up until much later. I canceled my lyft and used uber instead! I have still NOT been conpensated for the money that lyft took out of my account.. 10/10 would reconmend, MUCH BETTER THAN LYFT!!!! Thank you for getting me home safely!!

Paying with my Visa is an absolute nightmare. Drivers attemp to change the route just to collect more money since the application collects the money diectly from my card. Connecting with their customer support is an impossible and no one responds to any complaint. Very very very disappointed

I was a happy customer in the starting... With all the reasonable price for trip... But now a days it's charge's like hell , I got to know this when my friend & me tried to book for a place & she got ₹113 /- & I got ₹235/- Since then I have been checking & the prices are always high as compared to other's. Why is it happening I need to know.

Pathetic experience. The uber-auto never accepts the ride and when they do, they cancel after confirming the drop location. The rates are still sky-rocketting, even though we don't get the air conditioning facility in the cabs. Most of the cabs are old model Indica, which offer a very ricketty ride and not at all spinal cord friendly. The drivers usually drive very rashly, endangering the lives of the passengers in the cab as well as the pedestrians and other motorists.

Worst taxi app ever it's end the ride before the destination, why I will book cab If I have to travel by foot to reach the destination and even driver doesn't coporate that there must be some bugs that it ended ride before destination the ask for money and drop u on that palce only , when driver not arrive and we cancel a ride than it ask for cancellation fee , use ola or other mode

Can't login to account. Can't reset password due to a deleted email account. There is no person to talk to about unique scenarios. So really I can literally never use Uber again without creating a new email address or changing my phone number. Can't even delete it to start over.

:( Was given a $20 sk coupon to use for a ride to hospital visit 15 mins on Monday 9am. Uber pass discount, app showed for 'UberX' of between $16 to $17. I selected this, scrolled down. I was charged 32.50?! I tried to cancel not without a small fee, so I was stuck. Let driver Mike know even he said that was high and to contact Uber to complain. Twice I submitted complaints online that morning to their site and each time an auto reply came back "correct price was shown" Im going back to Lyft!!

Worst experience. Had to book the cab for my relatives and the driver was highly unreliable. He was not picking up calls and his phone was not reachable when called by phone. It is highly inconvenient when booking cab for someone else who is at another location. The driver doesn't contact the person even when his or her number is given. I don't think I will ever recommend the app to anyone. Ola is much better when booking the cab for someone else.

Last 2 updates flawed the app terribly It will say found 5 drivers but find a ride for you. It will then say no available rides currently, and after 20 min of not getting a ride i then have to be late to work. I'm not sure what's going on but please fix it.

Good app with affordable fares and easy booking . But if you are booking ride for someone else it doesn't have the option to give other persons number. This option should be added in this app. It is available in ola

Hi, I am using uber frequently these days. so I am buying uber gift cards, but there is a problem, every time at the end of the ride, it is showing "collect cash" and showing "0 rupees".   Every time I need to explain the drivers that amount is paid online and they ask me "it has showed collect cash then how is it online".     Please fix this issue,because of this problem I getting uncomfortable booking uber now.

I started preferring Uber over Ola when some friends told me that it charged less. But God..what a scam!! Everytime 2nd or 3rd time when I book, it would show one fare at the time of booking but charge 15 or 20 bucks extra at the end of the ride as booking fees. Whatever the heck is that, you should show the fare inclusive of all charges during the booking itself. Moreover there is no way to reach them from the app or the ride itself. Ola has been far more user friendly. So #NomoreUber

Was good until this week. I've bee taking uber for the past 3 months nearly every day twice a day. Same place. Same times. A TAXI IS CHEAPER IN MY AREA! Ever since Uber let drivers set rates it's become nonsense. The only people who fall for it are ignorant of the competition that exists, and that included me until today. I used to love using Uber. It used to be cost effective for nearly everything from a short trip to the golf course 4 miles away, or longer trips to LAX airport nearly 50 miles away. I even thought of getting rid of my car and using Uber exclusively, that's how effective it was. What a mistake that would have been! There's the Uber price, which can never find a car, then there's "a ride available at a higher rate" price, which is constant now. For me, a trip to the golf course used to be less than $10, now it's nearly $40. A trip to LAX used to be cheaper than parking there for three days, (about $90) now it's $400 EACH WAY! To be clear, the app quotes a reasonable rate, the drivers push that up to ridiculous levels. Yes they deserve to make money blah blah blah... but they are pushing themselves out of having as job. TAXI CABS ARE CHEAPER. Today I was quoted over $40 to go to the golf course only 4 miles away. The app says $13, but the drivers pushed the rate up to over $40. THE SAME RIDE IN A TAXI IS $15! I installed Lyft for the first time and got a ride to the golf course for $9. I had my fun and spent ~$25 on beer including tip. I got a ride home for $10. If I had to pay $40 EACH WAY, I simply wouldn't go or I'd drive myself and forego the beer. Where's the fun in that? Even a taxi would have been less than $15. Local taxi rates are $3.5 just to get the cab, plus $2.75 per mile. That's $14.5 total for 4 miles. I imagine most people in CA own their own car and use Uber for convenience. Well, $40 for a 4 mile trip worth less than $15 isn't convenient, I'd rather walk... but realistically will use Lyft or a cab instead. One thing for sure, I'm never using Uber again until they regain control of their business and their costs.

Safe and easy. Always on time. NOT! Rate from 5 to 1... I missed my Appointment! Set-up my ride last night, they cancelled. Set a new ride (twice) this morning, they cancelled only seconds before arriving.

Prices are starting to be a bit high but other than that its good! If ever i have a problem, there is never a deley or wait time when fixing the issue!

replyContent: Hi Tadas, we understand your concerns here. Please note that the Uber app doesn't entertain advertisements on it. If one is accessing the service through a third party app, advertisements may be shown while using the service. We would recommend the original Uber App if you would like to avoid advertisements from hindering your usage of our service.

content: It has one of the worst pick-up location managment it showed 3 drivers near me within 10mins reach yet i wasnt able to book my location? Than out of the blue it suddenly appeared after 5mins of trying and i got it booked like hell with this system.

That time

replyContent: Hi! We're always looking to improve your experience with Uber. Anything specific we can look into for you? Let us know by reaching out to us via the in-app Help section or by sending a quick note at t.uber.com/contact and we'll take it up from there.

content: Takes about three or four tries to connect to a driver and then, the driver ends up canceling the ride. Just had three Uber drivers cancel rides in a row. Then, when I cancel, I get hot with a cancellation fee.

replyContent: Hi Sebastian, the trip fare and pricing is subjective to demand and supply in the area at the time. It constantly changes with the rise/fall in either factor. We are working towards the fare policies to make it fair for both our riders and partners. For further queries, reach out to us at t.uber.com/contact and we'll connect.
